anya-e0201n5:2: Atha dhātupaccayasaṃsiddhaṃ kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpakaṃ liṅgabhedarahitaṃ kriyāpadhānavācakaṃ tyādyantanāmakaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ dīpiyate.
anya-e0201n5:3: Tattha kriyaṃ dhāretīti dhātu. Sā pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividhā.
anya-e0201n5:4: Tattha bhū, hū, gamu, paca iccādi pakatidhātu nāma sabhāvena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:5: Titikkha, tikiccha, bubhukkha, jighacchaiccādi vikatidhātu nāma saṅkhatavasena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:6: Puttīya, pabbatāya iccādi nāmadhātu nāma nāmabhūtassa sato kriyavācīpaccayayogena dhātuṭṭhāne ṭhitattā.
anya-e0201n5:8: Tatthayā dhātu kammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā sakammikā nāma. Gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:9: Yā kammanirapekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā akammikā nāma. Bhavati, hoti, tiṭṭhati, seti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:11: Tattha yā ekakammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā ekakammikā nāma. Gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:12: Yā padhānā’padhānavasena kammadvayāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadati, sā dvikammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:14: Tattha yā dhātu pāpanatthā hoti, sā nyādi nāma. Ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti, bhāraṃ gāmaṃ vahati, sākhaṃ gāmaṃ ākaḍḍhati.
anya-e0201n5:15: Sesā dvikammikā duhādi nāma. Gāviṃ khīraṃ duhati, brāhmaṇaṃ kambalaṃ yācati, dāyakaṃ bhikkhaṃ bhikkhati, goṇaṃ vajaṃ rundhati, bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati, sissaṃ dhammaṃ anusāsati, bhagavā bhikkhū etaṃ [vacanaṃ] avoca, rājā amaccaṃ vacanaṃ bravīti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:16: Tattha yadā kammasmiṃ rūpaṃ sijjhati, tadā vibhatti, paccayā nyādimhi padhānakammaṃ vadanti, duhādimhi apadhānakammaṃ, sabbadhātūsu kāritayoge kāritakammanti, sabbañcetaṃ dhātūnaṃ pakatiatthavasena vuttaṃ, anekatthattā pana dhātūnaṃ atthantaravacane vā nānupasaggayoge vā akammikāpi sakammikā honti, sakammikāpi akammikā honti.
anya-e0201n5:21: Vida – anubhavane, sukhaṃ vedeti, vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti ma. ni. 3.303.
anya-e0201n5:22: Vida – ārocane, vedayāmahaṃ bhante vedayatīti maṃ dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102, kāraṇaṃ nivedeti, dhammaṃ paṭivedeti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:24: Pada-gatiyaṃ, maggaṃ pajjati, paṭipajjati, maggo uppajjati, nipajjati, sampajjati, bhogo bhavati, sambhavati, bhogaṃ anubhavati, taṇhaṃ abhibhavati, paribhavati, adhibhavati, araññaṃ abhisambhavati, ajjhogāhatīti attho. Gacchantaṃ magge abhisambhavati, sampāpuṇātīti attho iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:25: Padānaṃ byañjanasampattiyā vā atthasampattiyā vā upakārakā vibhatti, paccayā paccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:26: Tattha vibhattiyo tyādi, tvādiiccādinā aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti, sarūpato channavutividhā.
anya-e0201n5:27: Tattha pubbachakkabhūtāni aṭṭhacattālīsarūpāni parassapadāni nāma. Parachakkabhūtāni aṭṭhacattālīsarūpāni attanopadāni nāma.
anya-e0201n5:28: Tattha parahitapaṭisaṃyuttesu ṭhānesu pavattibahulāni padāni parassapadāni nāma. Attahitapaṭisaṃyuttesu pavattibahulāni attanopadāni nāmāti eke.
anya-e0201n5:29: Paro vuccati kattā sabbakriyāsādhāraṇattā, attā vuccati kammaṃ sakasakakriyāsādhāraṇattā, parassa abhidhāyakāni padāni parassapadāni, attano abhidhāyakāni padāni attanopadānīti aññe.
anya-e0201n5:30: Attā vuccati padatthānaṃ sarīrabhūtā kriyā, kattunā pana sādhyaṭṭhena kriyarūpāni bhāva, kammānipi attāti vuccanti. Sādhakaṭṭhena tehi parabhūto kattā paro nāmāti apare.
anya-e0201n5:31: Attā vuccati amhattho, paro vuccati tumha, nāmattho, pubbachakkāni parabahulattā parassapadāni nāma, parachakkāni pana rūḷhīvasena attanopadāni nāmātipi vadanti. Idaṃ na yujjati parachakkesu tabbahulamattassāpi asiddhattā. Pāḷibhāsaṃ pana patvā dvinnaṃ chakkānaṃ attahita, parahitesu vā tīsu kārakesu vā pavattinānāttaṃ na dissatiyeva, tasmā imasmiṃ ganthe taṃ nāmadvayaṃ na gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:32: Paccayā pana catubbidhā vikaraṇa, kicca, kārita, dhātupaccayavasena.
anya-e0201n5:33: Tattha ye dhātusiddhāni tyādipadāni tabbādipadāni ca gaṇavibhāgavasena aññamaññaṃ visadisarūpāni karonti, te vikaraṇapaccayā nāma, la, ya, ṇoiccādayo.
anya-e0201n5:35: Paresaṃ āṇāpanasaṅkhāte payojakabyāpāre pavattā ṇi, ṇāpipaccayā kāritapaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:36: Visuṃ taṃtaṃkriyavācībhāvena dhāturūpā kha, cha, saiccādikā paccayā dhātupaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:37: ‘‘Kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpaka’’nti ettha atīta, paccuppannā’nāgata, kālavimuttavasena kālabhedo catubbidho.
anya-e0201n5:38: Tattha hiyyattanī, ajjattanī ajjatanī (bahūsu), parokkhāti imā tisso vibhattiyo atīte kāle vattanti.
anya-e0201n5:41: Sattamī, kālātipattīti dve kālavimutte vattanti, ayaṃ kira porāṇiko vibhattīnaṃ kamo, so ca pāḷiyā sametiyeva.
anya-e0201n5:43: Athopi viharissanti, esā buddhāna dhammatā’’ti a. ni. 4.21 ca –
anya-e0201n5:44: ‘‘Abbhatītā ca ye buddhā, vattamānā anāgatā’’ti ca apa. thera 1.1.588 pāḷī. Imasmiṃ kame pañcamī, sattamīti nāmadvayampi anvatthavasena siddhaṃ bhavati. Pacchā pana garuno vatticchāvasena vibhattīnaṃ nānākamaṃ karonti.
anya-e0201n5:45: Kattu, kamma, bhāvā pana kārakabhedo nāma. Tattha bhāvo duvidho sādhya, sādhanavasena visesana, visesyavasena ca. Tattha dhātvatthakriyā sādhyabhāvo nāma. Paccayatthakriyā sādhanabhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n5:46: Tesu sādhyabhāvo nānādhātūnaṃ vasena nānāvidho hoti. Sādhanabhāvo nānādhātvatthānaṃ pavattākārasaṅkhātena ekaṭṭhena ekova hoti. So pana yathā jāti nāma anuppannapakkhe ṭhite saṅkhatadhamme uppādentī viya khāyati, tathā vohāravisayamatte ṭhite sabbadhātvatthe pātubhonte karonto viya khāyati, tasmā so sādhananti ca kārakanti ca vuccati. Yathā ca jātivasena uppannā saṅkhatadhammā ‘‘cintanaṃ jātaṃ, phusanaṃ jāta’’ miccādinā ekantameva jātiṃ visesenti, tathā paccayatthavasena pātubhontā nānādhātvatthāpi ‘‘bhuyyate, gamyate, paccate, bhavanaṃ, gamanaṃ, pacana’’ miccādinā ekantameva paccayatthaṃ visesenti. Vatticchāvasena pana bhāvasādhanapadesu dhātvattha, paccayatthānaṃ abhedopi vattuṃ yujjatiyeva. Idha pana dvīsu bhāvesu sādhanabhāvo adhippetoti.
anya-e0201n5:47: Paṭhama, majjhimu’ttamapurisā purisabhedo. ‘Puriso’ti ca ‘‘yaṃkiñcāyaṃ purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā’’ti ma. ni. 3.1 ettha attā eva vuccati, so ca attā ‘‘so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedetī’’ti a. ni. 6.43; visuddhi. 2.580 ettha kārakoti vuccati. Iti ‘puriso’ti kārako eva.
anya-e0201n5:48: So ca tividho nāmattho, tumhattho, amhattho cāti. Tattha attano ajjhattasantānabhūtattā amhattho uttamapuriso nāma, sesā pana kamena paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapurisoti vuccanti. Vibhattiyo pana taddīpakattā paṭhamapurisādināmaṃ labhanti. Idañca nāmaṃ kārakabhede antogadhamevāti katvā imasmiṃ ganthe na gahitanti.
anya-e0201n5:50: ‘Liṅgabhedarahita’nti ‘‘puriso gacchati, itthī gacchati, kulaṃ gacchati’’ iccādīsu ‘puriso’iccādīnaṃ abhidheyyapadānaṃ liṅgānugato rūpabhedo ākhyātapade natthi.
anya-e0201n5:51: ‘Kriyāpadhānavācaka’nti ettha kriyaṃ eva padhānato abhidhāti, na nāmapadaṃ viya dabbaṃ padhānato abhidhātīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n5:52: Tattha kriyā nāma dhātvatthabhāvo vuccati, sā ca kālavasena atītakriyā, paccuppannakriyā, anāgatakriyā, kālavimuttakriyāti catubbidhā hoti.
anya-e0201n5:53: Āṇattikriyā, āsiṭṭhakriyā, anumatikriyā, parikappakriyā, araha, sakka, vidhi, nimantanā’mantanādikriyāti bahuvidho kriyābhedoti.
anya-e0201n5:54: Bhū-sattāyaṃ, santassa bhāvo sattā, tassaṃ sattāyaṃ, bhūdhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, sabbapadatthānaṃ sadda, buddhivisayabhāvena vijjamānabhāve vattatetyattho.
anya-e0201n5:56: Adhikārasuttamidaṃ, kriyatthā paraṃ vibhatti, paccayā bhavantīti attho. Kriyā attho yassāti kriyattho. Pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividho dhātu, kāritapaccayantarūpampi vikatidhātumhi saṅgayhati.
anya-e0201n5:57: 562.Vattamānetianti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mheka. 414; rū. 428; nī. 872; caṃ. 1.2.82; pā. 3.2.123.
anya-e0201n5:58: Ārabhitvā niṭṭhaṃ anupagato bhāvo vattamāno nāma, taṃsambandhīkālopi tadūpacārena vattamānoti vuccati. Vattamāne kāle kriyatthā paraṃ tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti. Ayañca vibhatti tyādīti ca vattamānakālavisayattā vattamānāti ca sijjhati.
anya-e0201n5:59: 563.Pubbāparachakkānamekānekesu tumhamhasesesu dve dve majjhimuttamapaṭhamāka. 408; rū. 431; nī. 867.
anya-e0201n5:60: Tumhanāmaṃ, amhanāmaṃ, tadubhayato sesanāmanti tīsu nāmesu payujjamānesu vā gamyamānesu vā ekasmiṃ vā anekesu vā atthesu pubbachakka, parachakkānaṃ dve dve majjhima, uttama, paṭhamā vibhattiyo bhavanti. ‘‘Uttamanti uttaraṃ antima’’nti cūḷamoggallāne vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:61: Ettha ca vibhattividhānamukhena taṃtaṃsaññāvidhānampi siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n5:62: Kathaṃ?Ti, anti, si, tha, mi, ma iti pubbachakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n5:63: Te, ante, se, vhe, e, mhe iti parachakkaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n5:64: Pubbachakke ca-ti, antidvayaṃ paṭhamadukaṃ nāma, si, thadvayaṃ majjhimadukaṃ nāma, mi, madvayaṃ uttamadukaṃ nāma. Evaṃ parachakke.
anya-e0201n5:65: Tattha tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sesanāme payujjamāne vā gamyamāne vā paṭhamadukaṃ bhavati. Tathā tumhanāme majjhimadukaṃ, amhanāme uttamadukaṃ. Dukesu ca ekasmiṃ atthe vattabbe ekavacanaṃ, bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:66: Ettha ca nāmānaṃ atthanissitā katvattha, kammatthā idha nāmatthāti vuccanti. Kattu, kammasaṅkhāte yasmiṃ nāmatthe tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti, so nāmattho tyādivācakānaṃ eva vāccabhūto vuttattho nāma hoti, na syādivibhattīnaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:67: Vuttakattu, kammādhiṭṭhānassa ca liṅgatthassa vācakaṃ nāmapadaṃ abhidheyyapadaṃ nāma, etadeva tulyādhikaraṇapadanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n5:68: Amādayo ca atthavācakavibhattiyo etasmiṃ okāsaṃ na labhanti, liṅgatthamattajotikā paṭhamāvibhatti eva okāsaṃ labhati. Evarūpāni tulyādhikaraṇabhūtāni abhidheyyapadāni sandhāya sutte ‘tumhamhasesesū’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:69: Idañca suttaṃ suddhehi tumha’mha, sesanāmehi yuttavākye ca missakehi yuttavākye cāti dvīsu dvīsu vākyesu veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:70: Tattha suddhehi yutte paccekaṃ dukāni vattanti. Yathā? So gacchati, te gacchanti, tvaṃ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, ahaṃ gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāmāti.
anya-e0201n5:71: Tathā suddhadvandepi. Yathā? So ca so ca gacchati, gacchanti vā. Te ca te ca gacchanti, so ca te ca gacchanti, tvañca tvañca gacchasi, gacchatha vā. Tumhe ca tumhe ca gacchatha, tvañca tumhe ca gacchathāti.
anya-e0201n5:72: Missakehi yutte dvandavākye pana ‘vippaṭisedhe’ti saṅketattā paradukāni eva okāsaṃ labhanti, tesu ca bahuvacanāni eva. Yathā? So ca tvañca gacchatha, so ca ahañca gacchāma, tvañca ahañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca ahañca gacchāma. Ekavacanacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:73: Te ca tumhe ca gacchatha, te ca mayañca gacchāma, tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:74: So ca tumhe ca gacchatha, so ca mayañca gacchāma, tvañca mayañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca mayañca gacchāma. Ekavacanamūlacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:75: Te ca tvañca gacchatha, te ca ahañca gacchāma, tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanamūlacatukkaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:76: Api ca tvañca so ca gacchatha, ahañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca ahañca so ca gacchāma, tumhe ca so ca gacchatha, mayañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca te ca gacchatha, ahañca te ca gacchāmaiccādīnipi catukkāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0201n5:77: Atrimā pāḷī – tuvañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasetha jā. 1.8.7. Ahañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasema jā. 1.8.7.
anya-e0201n5:78: Ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāma ma. ni. 2.160.
anya-e0201n5:79: Ahañca ime ca bhikkhū samādhinā nisīdimhā.
anya-e0201n5:80: Ahañca bhariyā ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1593.
anya-e0201n5:81: Ahañca sāmiko ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1617 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:82: Yaṃ pana ‘‘so ca gacchati, tvañca gacchasī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘tumhe gacchathā’’ti vā ‘‘so ca gacchati, ahañca gacchāmī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘mayaṃ gacchāmā’’ti vā vacanaṃ, taṃ pakatibahuvacanameva, na paropurisabahuvacanaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:83: Yañca kaccāyane – ‘‘sabbesamekābhidhāne paro puriso’’ti nī. 216 piṭṭhe suttaṃ, tatthapi sabbesaṃ dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā missakabhūtānaṃ nāma, tumha’mhānaṃ ekato abhidhāne missakadvandavākye paro puriso yojetabboti attho na na sambhavatīti.
anya-e0201n5:85: Aparokkhesu māna, nta, tyādīsu paresu kriyatthā paraṃ kattari lānubandho apaccayo hoti. Lānubandho ‘ūlasse’ti sutte visesanattho.
anya-e0201n5:86: Etena yattha māna, nta, tyādayo kattari vattanti, tattha ayaṃ lapaccayoti lapaccayena tesaṃ kattuvācakabhāvaṃ ñāpeti, esa nayo ‘‘kyo bhāvakammesu…’’ iccādīsupi.
anya-e0201n5:87: Ettha ca vikaraṇapaccayā nāma byañjanapūraṇā eva honti, na atthapūraṇā, tasmā yasmiṃ payoge tehi vinā padarūpaṃ na sijjhati, tattheva te vattanti. Yattha sijjhati, tattha na vattanti, ayampi lapaccayo dhātuto paraṃ vibhattisare vā āgamasare vā asante vattati, sante pana ‘‘pacāmi, pacāma, pacāhi, gameti, gamenti, vajjeti, vajjenti’’-iccādīsu kāriyantaratthāya vattati. Yattha ca paccayānaṃ lopo vihito, tattha gaṇantara, rūpantarappasaṅgapaṭisiddhāya vattati, aññattha na vattati.
anya-e0201n5:89: Vibhatti, paccayā paccayo nāma. I, kī, khi, ci, ji iccādayo ivaṇṇā nāma. Cu, ju, bhū, hū iccādayo uvaṇṇā nāma. Paccaye pare ekakkharadhātvantānaṃ ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṃ kamena e, ovuddhiyo honti. ‘Paro kvacī’ti parasaralopo.
anya-e0201n5:90: Saṃpubbo-sambhoti , sambhonti, sambhosi, sambhotha, sambhomi, sambhoma.
anya-e0201n5:91: Anupubbo-anubhavane, so bhogaṃ anubhoti, te bhogaṃ anubhonti, tvaṃ bhogaṃ anubhosi, tumhe bhogaṃ anubhotha, ahaṃ bhogaṃ anubhomi, mayaṃ bhogaṃ anubhoma.
anya-e0201n5:92: Tattha yathā ‘‘nīlo paṭo’’ti ettha nīlasaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:95: Nīlasaddo pana vaccātthameva ujuṃ vadati, nīlasaddamattaṃ suṇanto nīlaguṇameva ujuṃ jānāti, tasmā ‘‘paṭo’’ iti padantarena nīlasaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati.
anya-e0201n5:96: Tathā ‘‘anubhotī’’ti ettha tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:99: Tisaddo pana vāccatthameva ujuṃ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṃ. ‘‘Anubhotī’’ti suṇantosādhyakriyāsahitaṃ kattārameva ujuṃ jānāti, na kiñci dabbanti attho. Tasmā ‘‘so’’ iti padantarena tisaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati, vāccatthassa pana tisaddeneva ujuṃ vuttattā tatiyāvibhattiyā puna ācikkhitabbakiccaṃ natthi, liṅgatthajotanatthaṃ abhidheyyapade paṭhamāvibhatti eva pavattatīti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
anya-e0201n5:101: Sare pare e, onaṃ kamena aya, avā honti. Ya, vesu a-kāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0201n5:104: Hi, mi, mesu paresu a-kārassa dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:106: Parachakke – bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavamhe.
anya-e0201n5:108: Adhyā’bhi, paripubbo hiṃsāyaṃ, adhibhavati, abhibhavati, paribhavati.
anya-e0201n5:109: Vipubbo vināse, pākaṭe, sobhaṇe ca, vibhavati.
anya-e0201n5:111: Abhi, saṃpubbo pattiyaṃ, ajjhogāhe ca, abhisambhavati, tathā pātubbhavati, āvibhavati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:114: 568.Kyobhāvakammesvaparokkhesu māna nta tyādīsuka. 440; rū. 445; nī. 920; caṃ. 1.1.80; pā. 3.1.67.
anya-e0201n5:115: Parokkhāvajjitesu māna, ntapaccayesu tyādīsu ca paresu kriyatthā bhāvasmiṃ kammani ca kānubandho yapaccayo hoti, bahulādhikārā kvaci kattari ca.
anya-e0201n5:116: Rūpaṃ vibhuyyati, so pahīyissati saṃ. ni. 1.249, bhattaṃ paccati, gimhe udakaṃ chijjati, kusūlo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n5:118: Kānubandhe nāgame ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṃ assa ca te e, o,-ā na hontīti kyamhi vuddhi natthi.
anya-e0201n5:119: Kamme-tena purisena bhogo anubhūyati, tena bhogā anubhūyanti, tena tvaṃ anubhūyasi, tena tumhe anubhūyatha, tena ahaṃ anubhūyāmi, tena mayaṃ anubhūyāma. Yassa dvittaṃ rassattañca, anubhuyyati, anubhuyyanti.
anya-e0201n5:120: Tattha ‘‘anubhūyatī’’ti ettha kyapaccayasahitassa tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:123: Tisaddo pana kyapaccayasahito vāccatthameva ujuṃ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṃ. ‘‘Anubhūyatī’’ti suṇanto sādhyakriyāsahitaṃ kammasattiṃ eva ujuṃ jānāti, na kiñci dabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayameva.
anya-e0201n5:124: Anubhūyate , anubhuyyate, anubhūyante, anubhuyyante, anubhūyase, anubhūyavhe, anubhūye, anubhuyye, anubhūyamhe, anubhuyyamhe.
anya-e0201n5:126: Garupubbamhā rassato nte, ntīnaṃ reādeso hoti.
anya-e0201n5:127: Jāyare, jāyanti, jāyare, jāyante, gacchare, gacchanti, gacchare, gacchante, gamissare, gamissanti, gamissare, gamissante.
anya-e0201n5:130: Ettha ca suttavibhāgena ‘‘sabbaṃ hidaṃ bhañjare kālapariyāyaṃ jā. 1.15.370, muñcare bandhanasmā jā. 2.22.1648, jīvare’ vāpi sussatī’’ti jā. 2.22.840 etāni pāḷipadāni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n5:131: Tattha ‘bhañjare’ti bhijjati, ‘muñcare’ti muñcantu, ‘jīvare’ vāpī’ti jīvanto’vāpi. Anubhūyare, anubhūyanti, anubhūyare, anubhūyante.
anya-e0201n5:132: Bhāvo nāma bhavana, gamanādiko kriyākāro, so dhātunā eva tulyādhikaraṇabhāvena visesīyati, na nāmapadena, tasmā tattha tumha’mha, sesanāmavasena tyādidukavisesayogo nāma natthi, paṭhamadukameva tattha bhavati, dabbasseva ca tassa abyattasarūpattā saṅkhyābhedopi natthi, ekavacanameva bhavati.
anya-e0201n5:133: Tena bhogaṃ anubhūyati, anubhuyyati, anubhūyate, anubhuyyate, anubhavanaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:137: Yo suddhakattāraṃ payojeti, tassa payojakassa kattuno byāpāre kriyatthā ṇi ca ṇāpi ca honti. Ṇānubandhā vuddhutthā.
anya-e0201n5:138: Tesu ca ākārantato ‘ato’ (moga.) ṇāpiyeva hoti, dāpeti, dāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:140: Sesato dvepi, pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:141: Payojakabyāpāropi kriyā evāti tadatthavācīhi ṇi,-ṇāpīhi paraṃ vibhatti, paccayā bhavanti, dhātvantassa ca ṇi, ṇāpīnañca vuddhi.
anya-e0201n5:142: So maggaṃ bhāveti, te maggaṃ bhāventi, tvaṃ maggaṃ bhāvesi, tumhe maggaṃ bhāvetha, ahaṃ maggaṃ bhāvemi, mayaṃ maggaṃ bhāvema.
anya-e0201n5:144: E, onaṃ kamena āya, āvā honti sarādo ṇānubandhe paccaye pare, suttavibhattiyā aṇānubandhepi āyā’vā honti.
anya-e0201n5:147: Jhe-cintāyaṃ, jhāyati, jhāyanti, ujjhāyati, nijjhāyati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:149: Ṇi , ṇāpi, āpīhi ca kattari lo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:151: Iminā asare ṭhāne ayādesato paraṃ akāro hoti, so maggaṃ bhāvayati, bhāvayanti, bhāvayasi, bhāvayatha, bhāvayāmi, bhāvayāma.
anya-e0201n5:156: Kriyatthā parassa kyassa ādimhi īña hoti.
anya-e0201n5:157: Tena maggo bhāvīyati, tena maggā bhāvīyanti, tena tvaṃ bhāvīyasi, tena tumhe bhāvīyatha, tena ahaṃ bhāvīyāmi, tena mayaṃ bhāvīyāma.
anya-e0201n5:163: Ekakammā dvikammā ca, dvikammā ca tikammakā.
anya-e0201n5:164: Iti suddhakatturūpaṃ, suddhakammarūpaṃ, hetukatturūpaṃ, hetukammarūpanti ekadhātumhi cattāri nipphannarūpāni labbhanti.
anya-e0201n5:165: Katturūpena cettha kammakatturūpampi saṅgayhati. Kusūlo bhijjati, bhijjanadhammo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n5:166: Kammarūpena ca kattukammarūpampi saṅgayhati. Tattha yaṃ padaṃ kattuvācakaṃ samānaṃ saddarūpena kammarūpaṃ bhavati, taṃ kattukammarūpaṃ nāma, taṃ pāḷiyaṃ bahulaṃ dissati.
anya-e0201n5:167: Rūpaṃ vibhāviyyati mahāni. 108, atikkamiyyati, samatikkamiyyati, vītivattiyyati, nimittaṃ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhu paṭi. ma. 1.59, pavattaṃ abhibhuyyati paṭi. ma. 1.59, cutiṃ abhibhuyyati, upapattiṃ abhibhuyyatīti paṭi. ma. 1.59 gotrabhu iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:168: Tathā so pahīyethāpi nopi pahīyetha saṃ. ni. 1.249, so pahīyissati saṃ. ni. 1.249, nihiyyati yaso tassa dī. ni. 3.246, hiyyoti hiyyati poso, pareti parihāyati jā. 1.15.348, ājānīyā hasīyanti jā. 2.22.2369, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati jā. 2.22.1350 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:169: Yañca ‘yamhi dā dhā mā thā hā pā maha mathādīnamī’ti kaccāyane suttaṃ, taṃ kammani icchanti, kattari eva yujjati kammani ivaṇṇāgamassa sabbhāvā. Saddanītiyaṃ pana ‘‘so pahīyissatī’’ti padānaṃ bhāvarūpattaṃ daḷhaṃ vadati, tāni pana kattukammarūpāni evāti.
anya-e0201n5:170: Ettha ca vattamānaṃ catubbidhaṃ niccapavattaṃ, pavattāvirataṃ, pavattuparataṃ, samīpavattamānanti.
anya-e0201n5:171: Tattha niccapavatte – idhāyaṃ pabbato tiṭṭhati, candimasūriyā pariyāyanti, disā bhanti virocamānā a. ni. 4.69.
anya-e0201n5:172: Pavattāvirate – api nu te gahapati kule dānaṃ dīyatīti, dīyati me bhante kule dānaṃ a. ni. 9.20.
anya-e0201n5:173: Ettha ca yāva dāne saussāho, tāva yathāpavattā dānakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti ussāhassa aviratattā.
anya-e0201n5:174: Pavattuparate – na khādati ayaṃ maṃsaṃ, neva pāṇaṃ hanati a. ni. 3.67, na adinnaṃ ādiyati a. ni. 3.67. Ettha yāva tabbipakkhakriyaṃ na karoti, tāva viramaṇakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti.
anya-e0201n5:175: Samīpe – atīte – kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasi saṃ. ni. 1.130, rājagahato āgacchāmīti. Anāgate – dhammaṃ te desemi, sādhukaṃ suṇohi.
anya-e0201n5:176: Suttavibhattena tadāyoge atītepi ayaṃ vibhatti hoti, vākacīrāni dhunanto, gacchāmi ambare tadā bu. vaṃ. 2.37.
anya-e0201n5:177: Yāva, pure, purāyoge anāgatepi-idheva tāva tiṭṭhāhi, yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā, pure adhammo dibbati, dhammo paṭibāhiyyati cūḷava. 437, dante ime chinda purā marāmi jā. 1.16.127.
anya-e0201n5:178: Ekaṃsatthepi-nirayaṃ nūnagacchāmi, ettha me natthi saṃsayo jā. 2.22.331. Avassambhāviyatthepi-dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ bu. vaṃ. 2.109, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissati bu. vaṃ. 2.81 vā.
anya-e0201n5:179: Aniyamatthepi-manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā dha. pa. 2 cintetīti cittaṃ dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, phusatīti phasso dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, bujjhatīti buddho.
anya-e0201n5:180: Kadā karahiyogepi-kadā gacchati, karahi gacchati, gamissati vā.
anya-e0201n5:184: 575.Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṃ antaṃ su vho e āmaseka. 424; rū. 450; nī. 897; caṃ. 1.3.122; pā. 3.3.162.
anya-e0201n5:185: Vattamāne kāle pañha, patthanā, vidhīsu kriyatthā tvādayo honti.
anya-e0201n5:186: Pañhe-dhammaṃ vā tvaṃ adhiyassu vinayaṃ vā pāci. 471 (atthato sadisaṃ).
anya-e0201n5:188: Tattha patthanāyaṃ-bhavābhave saṃsaranto, saddho homi amaccharī.
anya-e0201n5:189: Āsīsāyaṃ-etena saccavajjena, pajjunno abhivassatu cariyā. 3.89, sabbe bhadrāni passantu jā. 1.2.105, sabbe sattā averā hontu paṭi. ma. 2.22.
anya-e0201n5:191: Āyācane-desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ dī. ni. 2.68, ovadatu maṃ bhagavā saṃ. ni. 3.1, anusāsatu maṃ sugata saṃ. ni. 3.1, ullumpatu maṃ bhante saṅgho mahāva. 71, asmākaṃ adhipannānaṃ, khamassu rājakuñjara jā. 2.21.181, etha byagghā nivattavho jā. 1.3.66.
anya-e0201n5:193: Tattha vidhimhi-akusalaṃ pajahatha, kusalaṃ upasampajja viharatha paṭi. ma. 3.30; pārā. 19, evaṃ vitakketha, mā evaṃ vitakketha paṭi. ma. 3.30.
anya-e0201n5:194: Niyojane-etha bhikkhave sīlavā hotha a. ni. 5.114, appamādena sampādetha dī. ni. 2.185, etha gaṇhatha bandhatha dī. ni. 2.342, mā vo muñcittha kiñcanaṃ dī. ni. 2.342.
anya-e0201n5:198: Pavāraṇāyaṃ-vadatu maṃ bhante saṅgho mahāva. aṭṭha. 213, vadetha bhante yenattho pārā. 290.
anya-e0201n5:199: Anumatiyaṃ-paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohi pāci. 374.
anya-e0201n5:200: Varadāne-phussatī varavaṇṇābhe, varassu dasadhā vare jā. 2.22.1655, icchitaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, khippameva samijjhatu a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.192.
anya-e0201n5:201: Anuññāyaṃ-puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi dī. ni. 2.356.
anya-e0201n5:204: Akkose-muddhā te phalatu sattadhā jā. 1.16.295, corā taṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindantu ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.
anya-e0201n5:205: Sapathe-etena saccavajjena, putto uppajjataṃ ise jā. 1.14.104, musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā jā. 1.14.104.
anya-e0201n5:206: Āmantane-etu vessantaro rājā jā. 2.22.2341, ‘‘ehi bhikkhu cara brahmacariyaṃ mahāva. 28, etha bhikkhave sīlavā hotha’’ iccādīsupi ehi, ethasaddā āmantane tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0201n5:207: Nimantane-adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ pārā. 77.
anya-e0201n5:208: Pavedane-vedayatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102, upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu dī. ni. 1.299, punārāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisa dī. ni. 2.369.
anya-e0201n5:209: Pattakāle-parinibbātu bhante bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato, parinibbānakālo bhante bhagavato dī. ni. 2.168, kālo kho te mahāvīra, uppajja mātukucchiyaṃ bu. vaṃ. 1.67, byākarohi aggivessana na dāni te tuṇhībhāvassa kālo ma. ni. 1.357.
anya-e0201n5:210: Anubhotu, anubhontu, anubhohi, anubhotha, anubhomi, anubhoma, bhavatu, bhavantu, ‘himimesvassā’ti hi, mi, mesu assa dīgho, tvaṃ paṇḍito bhavāhi.
anya-e0201n5:214: Iminā ato hissa lopo, tvaṃ paṇḍito bhava.
anya-e0201n5:216: Parachakke-so bhavataṃ, te bhavantaṃ, tvaṃ bhavassu, tumhe bhavavho, ahaṃ bhave, mayaṃ bhavāmase, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n5:217: Anubhūyatu , anubhūyantu, anubhuyyatu, anubhuyyantu iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:218: Bhāvetu, bhāventu, bhāvayatu, bhāvayantu iccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:219: Bhāvīyatu, bhāvīyantu. Rassatte-bhāviyatu, bhāviyantu. Dvitte-bhāviyyatu, bhāviyyantu. Tathā bhāvayīyatu, bhāvayīyantuiccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:220: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādisuttena thassa vho, tumhe bhavavho, bhavatha vā.
anya-e0201n5:224: 577.Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṃ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṃ etho eyyāvhoeyyavho (moggallānādīsu)eyyaṃ eyyāmhe vāka. 416; rū. 454; nī. 880; caṃ. 1.3.120; pā. 3.3.156.
anya-e0201n5:225: Aññamaññasambandhiniyā hetukriyāyañca phalakriyāyañca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti vā. Hetuphalesupi kadāci aññavibhattuppattidīpanattho vāsaddo, sace so yānaṃ labhissati, gamissati, sace na labhissati, na gamissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:226: Sace saṅkhāro nicco bhaveyya, sukho nāma bhaveyya, sace so paṇḍito bhaveyya, sukhito bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n5:229: Pañhe-kinnu kho tvaṃ vinayaṃ vā adhiyyeyyāsi dhammaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n5:231: Vidhimhi-pāṇaṃ na haneyya, adinnaṃ na ādiyeyya, dānaṃ dadeyya, sīlaṃ rakkheyya.
anya-e0201n5:234: Bhavaṃ rajjaṃ kareyya, bhavaṃ rajjaṃ kātuṃ sakko, kātuṃ arahoti attho.
anya-e0201n5:235: So imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.23.
anya-e0201n5:238: Pabbatamapi sirasā bhindeyya, bhaveyya, bhaveyyuṃ, bhaveyyāsi, bhaveyyātha, bhaveyyāmi, bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0201n5:239: Parachakke-so bhavetha, te bhaveraṃ, tvaṃ bhavetho, tumhe bhaveyyāvho, ahaṃ bhaveyyaṃ, mayaṃ bhaveyyāmhe, iti suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n5:240: Anubhūyeyya, anubhūyeyyuṃ. Dvitte rassattaṃ, anubhuyyeyya, anubhuyyeyyuṃ iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:241: Bhāveyya , bhāveyyuṃ, bhāvayeyya, bhāvayeyyuṃ iccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:242: Bhāvīyeyya, bhāvīyeyyuṃ. Rassatte-bhāvayiyeyya, bhāvayiyeyyuṃ. Dvitte-bhāviyyeyya, bhāviyyeyyuṃ. Tathā bhāvayīyeyya, bhāvayīyeyyuṃ iccādi hetukammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:244: Eyya, eyyāsi, eyyamiccetesaṃ ṭe hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:245: Atrimā pāḷī-caje mattā sukhaṃ dhīro, passe ce vipulaṃ sukhaṃ dha. pa. 290. Kiṃ tvaṃ sutasomā’nutappe jā. 2.21.399, dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase jā. 1.13.94 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:246: So bhave, bhaveyya, tvaṃ bhave, bhaveyyāsi, ahaṃ bhave, bhaveyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:249: Atrimā pāḷī-vajjuṃ vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā jā. 1.3.33, upayānāni me dajjuṃ, rājaputta tayī gateti jā. 2.22.26.
anya-e0201n5:251: Eyyāmassa emu ca hoti, antassa u ca.
anya-e0201n5:252: Atrimā pāḷī-kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayaṃ dī. ni. 2.318, muñcemu naṃ uragaṃ bandhanasmā jā. 1.15.252, dakkhemu te nāga nivesanāni jā. 1.15.254, gantvāna taṃ paṭikaremu accayaṃ, appeva naṃ putta labhemu jīvitaṃ jā. 1.15.13, dajjemu kho pañcasatāni bhoto jā. 2.22.1302, pañhaṃ pucchemu mārisa dī. ni. 2.354, viharemu averino dī. ni. 2.357, tayājja guttā viharemu rattinti jā. 1.2.18. Bhaveyyāmu, bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0201n5:253: Mahāvuttinā kvaci majjhe yyā-kārassa lopo, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchesi jā. 1.16.150, uregaṇḍāyo bujjhesi, tāyo bujjhesi māṇava jā. 2.17.132-133, yathā gatiṃ me abhisambhavetha jā. 2.17.87-89, yathā gatiṃ te abhisambhavema jā. 2.17.87-89, okāsaṃ sampajānātha, vane yattha vasemaseti jā. 2.22.1885 ‘vasāmase’.
anya-e0201n5:254: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādisuttena eyyāthassa o ca, tumhe bhaveyyātho, bhaveyyātha vā.
anya-e0201n5:255: Ettha ca pubbe vuttā pañha, patthanā, vidhippabhedā idhapi yathāpayogaṃ veditabbā. Pañhasaddena paripañha, paripucchā, parivitakka, parivīmaṃsādayo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n5:256: Paripañhe-dhammaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyeyyāma vinayaṃ vā.
anya-e0201n5:257: Paripucchāyaṃ-vadetha bhante kimahaṃ kareyyaṃ, ko imassa attho, kathañcassa atthaṃ ahaṃ jāneyyaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:258: Parivitakke-kassāhaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ dī. ni. 2.72, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā.
anya-e0201n5:259: Parivīmaṃsāyaṃ-gaccheyyaṃ vā ahaṃ uposathaṃ, na vāgaccheyyaṃ mahāva. 137.
anya-e0201n5:260: Patthanāyaṃ-evaṃrūpo siyaṃ ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ ma. ni. 3.274, ummādantyā ramitvāna, sivirājā tato siyaṃ jā. 2.18.70, passeyya taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ jā. 2.21.453.
anya-e0201n5:261: Āyācane-labheyyāhaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ mahāva. 28; saṃ. ni. 2.17.
anya-e0201n5:263: Niyojane-careyyādittasīsova, natthi maccussa nā gamo saṃ. ni. 1.145.
anya-e0201n5:264: Ajjhesane-yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyya mahāva. 132, yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya mahāva. 70.
anya-e0201n5:266: Anumatiyaṃ-taṃ jano hareyya vā daheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya ma. ni. 1.247.
anya-e0201n5:268: Āmantane-yadā te pahiṇeyyāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya jā. 2.22.635.
anya-e0201n5:270: Pattakāle-saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya mahāva. 167.
anya-e0201n5:271: ‘Sambhāvane vā’ti vāsaddo avuttavikappanattho, tena parikappa, kriyātipannādayo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n5:273: Tattha bhūtaparikappe-yo bālaṃ seveyya, sopi bālo bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n5:274: Abhūtaparikappe-yadā kacchapalomānaṃ, pāvāro tividho siyā jā. 1.8.78. Yadā sasavisāṇānaṃ, nisseṇī sukatā siyā jā. 1.8.79.
anya-e0201n5:275: Kriyātipanne-sace so agāraṃ ajjhāvaseyya, rājā assa cakkavattī dī. ni. 3.136.
anya-e0201n5:279: 584.Anajjattane ā ū o ttha a mhā ttha tthuṃ se vhaṃ iṃ mhaseka. 418; rū. 456; nī. 886; caṃ. 1.2.77; pā. 3.2.111.
anya-e0201n5:280: Ajjato aññasmiṃ bhūte kāle kriyatthā paraṃ āiccādayo honti.
anya-e0201n5:282: Āiccādīsu īiccādīsu ssādīsu ca tesaṃ ādimhi au hoti vā.

Tathā o-vibhattiyā ca, dubbheyyaṃ maṃ amaññatha iccādi.

anya-e0201n5:300: 589.Eyyāthasseaāīthānaṃ o a aṃ ttha ttho vho vāka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105; ‘…vhoka’ (bahūsu).

anya-e0201n5:304: Atrimā pāḷī – īmhi-paṅko ca mā visiyittho jā. 1.13.44, sañjagghittho mayā saha jā. 1.16.241. Āmhi-anumodittha vāsavo jā. 2.22.1667, nimantayittha vāsavo jā. 2.22.1667, khubbhittha nagaraṃ tadā jā. 2.22.1673, subhūtitthero gāthaṃ abhāsittha theragā. 1. Amhi-idhāhaṃ mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavocaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.119, ajānamevaṃ āvuso avacaṃ jānāmīti pārā. 195, ahaṃ kāmānaṃ vasamanvagaṃ jā. 2.19.45, ajjhagaṃ amataṃ santiṃ iccādi.

anya-e0201n5:308: 591.Ossa a i ttha tthoka. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105.
anya-e0201n5:310: Tvaṃ abhava, tvaṃ abhavi, tvaṃ abhavittha, tvaṃ abhavittho.
anya-e0201n5:311: Atrimā pāḷī-ossa atte-mā hevaṃ ānanda avaca dī. ni. 2.95, tvameva dāni’makara, yaṃ kāmo byagamā tayi jā. 1.2.167. Itte-mā tvaṃ bhāyi mahārāja, mā tvaṃ bhāyi rathesabha jā. 2.22.684, mā cintesi mā tvaṃ soci, yācāmi luddakaṃ ahaṃ gavesitabbaṃ. Tthattemāssu tiṇṇo amaññittha jā. 2.22.255, mā kilittha mayā vinā jā. 2.22.1713, māssu kujjhittha nāvika jā. 1.6.5. Tthotte-mā purāṇe amaññittho theragā. 280, mā dayhittho punappunaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.212, tiṇamatte asajjittho jā. 1.1.89, mā tvaṃ brahmuno vacanaṃ upātivattittho ma. ni. 1.502, mā tvaṃ maññittho na maṃ jānātī ma. ni. 1.502 ti.
anya-e0201n5:313: Suttavibhattena tthassa ttho hoti, taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante, yāvantettha samāgatā apa. thera 1.1.367, massu mittānaṃ dubbhittho. Mittadubbho hi pāpakoti jā. 1.16.222.
anya-e0201n5:314: Mahāvuttinā ossa kvaci lopo, puna dānaṃ adā tuvaṃ jā. 2.22.1786, mā no tvaṃ tāta adadā jā. 2.22.2126, mā bhoti kupitā ahu jā. 2.22.1931, māhu pacchānutāpinī saṃ. ni. 1.162; therīgā. 57.
anya-e0201n5:320: Assosumhā, ahesumhā, avocumhā, avocuttha iccādīni dissanti.
anya-e0201n5:321: Tumhe abhavuttha, bhavuttha, abhavittha, bhavittha vā, mayaṃ abhavumhā, bhavumhā, abhavimhā, bhavimhā vā.
anya-e0201n5:323: Imiccassa mhā, tthānañca ādimhi suu hoti, sāgamo hotīti attho. Casaddena īādīnampi ādimhi sāgamo hoti, sāgame ca sati byañjanaṃ hoti, tassa ādimhi iāgamo labbhati. Tena ‘‘imā gāthā abhāsisuṃ gavesitabbaṃ, te me asse ayācisuṃ, yathābhūtaṃ vipassisuṃ’’ jā. 2.22.1863 iccādīni dī. ni. 3.277 sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n5:324: So bhogaṃ anubhosi, anubhavi vā, tumhe anubhosittha, anubhavittha vā, ahaṃ anubhosi, anubhaviṃ vā. Mayaṃ anubhosimhā anubhavimhā vā.
anya-e0201n5:326: Edantato odantato ca parassa uṃvacanassa suṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:327: Ānesuṃ, sāyesuṃ, cintesuṃ, paccanubhosuṃ, paribhosuṃ, adhibhosuṃ, abhibhosuṃ.

anya-e0201n5:332: Tena bhogā anvabhūyuṃ, anubhūyuṃ, anvabhūyiṃsu, anubhūyiṃsu iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.

anya-e0201n5:340: 596.Parokkhe a u e tha aṃ mha ttha re ttho vho iṃ mheka. 417; rū. 460; nī. 887; caṃ. 1.2.81; pā. 3.2.115.
anya-e0201n5:341: Akkhānaṃ indriyānaṃ paraṃ parokkhaṃ, apaccakkhanti attho. Bhūte kāle attano parokkhakriyāya vattabbāya kriyatthā aādayo honti.
anya-e0201n5:342: Mahāvuttinā gassa dīgho vā, so kira jagāma, te kira jagāmu, tvaṃ kira jagāme, tumhe kira jagāmittha, ahaṃ kira jagāmaṃ, mayaṃ kira jagāmimha iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:343: Ettha ca ‘so kira jagāma’ iccādīni anussavaparokkhāni nāma.
anya-e0201n5:344: ‘Ahaṃ kira jagāmaṃ, mayaṃ kira jagāmimhā’ti idaṃ attanā gantvāpi gamanaṃ pamuṭṭhassa vā asampaṭicchitukāmassa vā paṭivacanaparokkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n5:346: Parokkhamhi pubbakkharaṃ ekassaraṃ dverūpaṃ hoti, casaddena aññasmimpi dvedverūpaṃ sijjhati.
anya-e0201n5:347: Caṅkamati, daddallati, dadāti, jahāti, juhoti, lolupo, momūho.
anya-e0201n5:349: Dvitte pubbesaṃ dutiya, catutthānaṃ kamena paṭhama, tatiyā honti.
anya-e0201n5:351: Dvitte pubbassa bhūssa anto a hoti.
anya-e0201n5:353: Dvitte bhūdhātussa ante vuka hoti, vāgamo hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:355: So kira rājā babhūva, te kira rājāno babhūvu, tvaṃ babhūve.
anya-e0201n5:356: ‘A ī ssā ssatyādīnaṃ byañjanassiu’ iti suttena byañjanādimhi iāgamo, tumhe babhūvittha, ahaṃ babhūvaṃ, mayaṃ babhūvimha , so babhūvittha, te babhūvire, tvaṃ babhūvittho, tumhe babhūvivho, ahaṃ babhūviṃ, mayaṃ babhūvimhe, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n5:357: ‘Kyo bhāvakammesvaparokkhesū’ti paṭisiddhattā parokkhamhi bhāvakammesu yapaccayo na hoti, ‘tena kira bhogo anubabhūvittha, tena bhogo anubabhūvire’tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:361: 601.Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssasi ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṃ ssāmheka. 421; rū. 473; nī. 892; caṃ. 1.3.2; pā. 3.3.13.

anya-e0201n5:365: Tattha garahāyaṃ-atthi nāma tāta sudinna ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi pārā. 32.
anya-e0201n5:366: Vimhaye-yatra hi nāma saññī samāno pañcamattānaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ saddaṃ na sossati dī. ni. 2.192.
anya-e0201n5:367: Anutthunanādīsu-na attanā paṭicodessaṃ, na gaṇassa ārocessaṃ pāci. 665, na pubbe dhanamesissaṃ jā. 1.12.50, iti pacchānutappati jā. 1.12.53, bhūtānaṃ nāpacāyissaṃ, pahu santo na posissaṃ, paradāraṃ asevissaṃ jā. 1.12.54, na pubbe payirupāsissaṃ jā. 1.12.58, iti pacchānutappati jā. 1.12.50, anekajātisaṃsāraṃ, sandhāvissaṃ anibbisaṃ dha. pa. 153.
anya-e0201n5:368: Katthaci pana gāthāvasena ekasakāralopo, mitto mittassa pāniyaṃ, adinnaṃ paribhuñjisaṃ jā. 1.11.59, nirayamhi apaccisaṃ therīgā. 438, gacchanto naṃ udakkhisaṃ gavesitabbaṃ, yoniso paccavekkhisaṃ theragā. 347 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:369: ‘A ī ssā ssatyādīnaṃ byañjanassiu’ iti iāgamo, bhavissati, bhavissanti, bhavissare, bhavissasi, bhavissatha, bhavissāmi, bhavissāma, bhavissate, bhavissante, bhavissare, bhavissase, bhavissavhe, bhavissaṃ, bhavissāmhe.
anya-e0201n5:373: Kyassa lopo hoti vā ssakāravati vibhattimhi.

anya-e0201n5:375: Tena bhogo anubhavissati, anubhūyissati vā, tena bhogā anubhavissanti, anubhūyissanti vā iccādi suddhakammarūpaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:376: Bhāvissati, ‘ūlasse’ti issa e, bhāvessati, bhāvayissatiiccādi hetukatturūpaṃ.

anya-e0201n5:381: 604.Eyyādotipattiyaṃ ssā ssaṃsu sse ssatha ssaṃ ssāmhā ssatha ssiṃsu ssase ssavhe ssiṃ ssāmhaseka. 422; rū. 475; nī. 895; caṃ. 1.3.107; pā. 3.3.139; eyyādo vātipattiyaṃ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n5:382: Eyyādivisaye kriyātipattiyaṃ ssādayo bhavanti. Eyyādivisayo nāma hetuphalakriyāsambhavo, tadubhayakriyāya abhāvo kriyātipatti.
anya-e0201n5:383: Sā duvidhā atītā ca anāgatā ca.

anya-e0201n5:385: Anāgatāyaṃ-sacāhaṃ na gamissaṃ, mahājāniyo so abhavissā iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:386: ‘Āīssādīsvau vā’iti dhātvādimhi vikappena akārāgamo,‘a īssā ssatyādīnaṃ byañjanassiu’ iti ssādīsu iāgamo, abhavissā, bhavissā, abhavissaṃsu, bhavissaṃsu, abhavisse, bhavisse, abhavissatha, bhavissatha, abhavissaṃ, bhavissaṃ, abhavissāmhā, bhavissāmhā, abhavissatha, bhavissatha, abhavissiṃsu, bhavissiṃsu, abhavissase, bhavissase, abhavissavhe, bhavissavhe, abhavissiṃ, bhavissiṃ, abhavissāmhase, bhavissāmhase.
anya-e0201n5:387: ‘Āīū’iccādinā ssā, ssāmhānaṃ rassatte-so abhavissa, bhavissa, mayaṃ abhavissāmha, bhavissāmha. ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā ssessa atte-tvaṃ abhavissa, bhavissa iccādīni rūpacatukkāni yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbāni.
anya-e0201n5:394: Ito paṭṭhāya sarantadhātuyo sarānukkamena, byañjanantadhātuyo akkharānukkamena vuccante.
anya-e0201n5:395: Kaccāyanaganthe anekassaradhātuyo idha byañjanantadhātuyo nāma. Tasmā idha dhātvantasaralopakiccaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0201n5:396: Khā, khyā-kathane, gā-sadde, ghā-gandhopādāne, ñā-paññāyane avabodhane ca, ṭhā-gatinivattiyaṃ, tā-pālane, thā-ṭhāne , dā-dāne, dhā-dhāraṇe, pā-pāne, phā-vuddhiyaṃ, bhā-dittiyaṃ, mā-māne, yā-gatiyaṃ, lā-ādāne chedane ca, vā-gati, bandha, gandhanesu, sā-assādane tanukaraṇe antakammani ca, hā-cāge, nhā-soceyye.
anya-e0201n5:397: Tyādyuppatti, kattarilo, mahāvuttinā sare pare ādantamhā kvaci yāgamo, akkhāti. Parassaralopo, akkhāyati, kriyaṃ ākhyāti, ākhyāyati, jātiṃ akkhāhi pucchito su. ni. 423, saṅgāyati, saṅgāyiṃsu mahesayo vi. va. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā, gandhaṃ ghāyati, paññāyati, paññāyanti, paññāyatu, paññāyantu.
anya-e0201n5:398: Kamme kyo, dhammo ñāyati, dhammā ñāyanti, viññāyati, viññāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:400: Kamme-ñāpīyati, ñāpīyanti, ṭhāti, ṭhānti, opupphā padmā ṭhānti, mālāva ganthitā ṭhānti, dhajaggāneva dissare jā. 2.22.1989.
anya-e0201n5:402: Ñānubandhassa īāgamassa ca kattari vihitassa lapaccayassa ca kvaci ettaṃ hotīti lassa ettaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:405: Ṭhā, pānaṃ tiṭṭha, pivā honti nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n5:407: 607.Pādito ṭhāssa vā ṭhaho kvacika. 517; rū. 488; nī. 1105.
anya-e0201n5:408: Pādayo upasaggā pādi nāma, pādito parassa ṭhāssa ṭhaho hoti vā kvaci.
anya-e0201n5:409: Saṇṭhahati, saṇṭhahanti, saṇṭhāti, saṇṭhānti, upaṭṭhahati, upaṭṭhahanti, upaṭṭhāti, upaṭṭhānti.
