anya-e0201n5:414: Aññādissāti kiṃ? Ñāyati, ñāyanti, ākkhāyati, ākkhāyanti, ākhyāyati, ākhyāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:416: Ajjhattanimhi vikappena sāgamo, aṭṭhāsi, patiṭṭhāsi, adhiṭṭhahi, adhiṭṭhāsi, adhiṭṭhesi, saṇṭhahi, saṇṭhāsi, upaṭṭhahi, upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0201n5:417: ‘Uṃssiṃsvaṃsū’ti uṃssa iṃsu, aṃsu, adhiṭṭhahiṃsu, saṇṭhahiṃsu, upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Atthamentamhi sūriye, vāḷā panthe upaṭṭhahuṃ jā. 2.22.2186. Aṭṭhaṃsu, upaṭṭhahaṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:421: ‘Eontāsu’nti uṃssasuṃ, saralopo, aṭṭhāsuṃ, upaṭṭhāsuṃ, patiṭṭhāpesuṃ, saṇṭhāpesuṃ, patiṭṭhāpayuṃ, saṇṭhāpayuṃ, patiṭṭhāpayiṃsu, saṇṭhāpayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:422: Ssatyādimhi-ṭhassati, ṭhassanti, rassattaṃ, upaṭṭhissati, upaṭṭhissanti, ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ jā. 2.22.1934, saṇṭhahissati, saṇṭhahissanti.
anya-e0201n5:425: Thā-ṭhāne, avatthāti, avatthāyati, vitthāyati, vitthāyanti, mā kho vitthāsi mahāva. 126.
anya-e0201n5:426: Dā-dāne, ‘ūlasse’ti lassa ettaṃ, deti, denti, desi, detha, demi, dema.
anya-e0201n5:427: ‘Parokkhāyañcā’ti sutte casaddena dāssa dvittaṃ. ‘Rasso pubbassā’ti pubbassa rassattaṃ, dadāti, dadanti, dadāsi, dadātha, dadāmi, dadāma.
anya-e0201n5:429: Advitte dāssa daṃ hoti vā mi, mesu, niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:433: Pādito parassa dāssa iyaṅa hoti kvaci.
anya-e0201n5:434: ‘Iyaṅa’ iti suttavibhattena aññadhātūnampi. Jā-hāniyaṃ, appena bahuṃ jiyyāma jā. 1.2.52, tassevā’nuvidhiyyati jā. 1.2.67, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati jā. 2.22.1350, nihīyati tassa yaso jā. 1.10.60; a. ni. 4.17, eko rājā vihiyyasi jā. 2.22.1750, so pahīyissati saṃ. ni. 1.249 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:435: Ādiyati, ādiyanti, upādiyati, upādiyanti, samādiyati, samādiyanti, sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmi khu. pā. 2.1, vattaṃ samādiyāmi cūḷava. 85.
anya-e0201n5:436: 611.Gama vada dānaṃ ghamma vajja dajjāka. 499-500-1; rū. 443-486-507; nī. 1013, 1005-1006.
anya-e0201n5:437: Etesaṃ ghamma, vajja, dajjā honti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n5:438: Dajjati, dajjanti, dajjasi, dajjatha, dajjāmi, dajjāma.
anya-e0201n5:440: Kamme ‘aññādissi kye’ti kyamhi āssa ittaṃ, diyati, diyanti.
anya-e0201n5:444: Pādipubbe rasso, samādapeti ma. ni. 2.387; 3.276, samādapenti, samādapayati, samādapayanti.
anya-e0201n5:446: Eyyādimhi mahāvuttinā dajjato eyyādīnaṃ antassa eyyassa lopo vā, dānaṃ dajjā, dadeyya, dajjuṃ, dadeyyuṃ, dajjāsi, dadeyyāsi, dajjātha, dadeyyātha, dajjāmi, dadeyyāmi, dajjāma, dadeyyāma, ahaṃ dajjaṃ, dadeyyaṃ, mayaṃ dajjāmhe, dadeyyāmhe.
anya-e0201n5:447: Atrimā pāḷī-dajjā sappuriso dānaṃ jā. 2.22.2261, upāyanāni me dajjuṃ jā. 2.22.24, mātaraṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino jā 1.16.227. Tāni ammāya dajjesi jā. 2.22.2149, chaṭṭhāhaṃ dajjamattānaṃ, neva dajjaṃ mahosadhaṃ jā. 1.16.225.
anya-e0201n5:448: Ajjhattanimhi-adadi, adāsi, adaduṃ, adaṃsu, adajji, adajjuṃ, tvaṃ adado. Varañce me ado sakka jā. 2.17.142.
anya-e0201n5:449: Parachakke-so dānaṃ adā, brāhmaṇassa adā dānaṃ, sivīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhano jā. 2.22.2117.
anya-e0201n5:450: Ssatyādimhi-dāssati, dāssanti, dadissati, dadissanti, dajjissati, dajjissanti.
anya-e0201n5:451: Dāiccassa diccha, pavecchādesampi icchanti, vipulaṃ annaṃ pānañca, samaṇānaṃ pavecchasi therīgā. 272. Appasmeke pavecchanti, bahuneke na dicchare saṃ. ni. 1.33. Devo sammā dhāraṃ pavecchatu. Bhojanaṃ bhojanatthīnaṃ, sammadeva pavecchatha.
anya-e0201n5:452: Dhā-dhāraṇe, sandhāti, vidhāti, nidheti, nidhenti. Vidheti, vidhenti.
anya-e0201n5:453: ‘Parokkhāyañcā’ti casaddena dvittaṃ. ‘Dutiyacatutthāna…’nti dhassa dattaṃ. ‘Rasso pubbassā’ti pubbassa rasso.
anya-e0201n5:456: Saddahāti, saddahati vā. Saddahāti tathāgatassa bodhiṃ. Vidahāti, nidahāti, saddahanti, vidahanti, nidahanti.
anya-e0201n5:457: ‘Mayadā sare’ti sutte ‘mayadā’ti suttavibhattiyā byañjanepi niggahītassa dattaṃ, kammaṃ saddahāti, kammaphalaṃ saddahāti, saddahanti, vatthaṃ paridahāti, paridahanti.
anya-e0201n5:458: Kamme-sandhīyati, sandhīyanti, sandhiyyati, sandhiyyanti, vidhiyyati. Navena sukhadukkhena, porāṇaṃ apidhiyyati jā. 1.2.114.
anya-e0201n5:462: Īādimhi-saddahi, saddahiṃsu. Tatra bhikkhavo samādahiṃsu dī. ni. 2.332, samādahaṃsu vā.
anya-e0201n5:466: Ṇimhi-‘āssā ṇāpimhi yuka’ iti suttena ṇānubandhe āssa ante yāgamo, puttaṃ thaññaṃ pāyeti, pāyenti, pāyayati, pāyayanti.
anya-e0201n5:469: Atrimā pāḷī-ayañhi te mayā’ruḷho, saro pissati lohitaṃ jā. 2.22.1968,aggodakāni pissāmi, yūthassa purato vajaṃ jā. 1.8.14. Naḷena vāriṃ pissāma, na ca maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasi jā. 1.1.20.
anya-e0201n5:470: Bhā-dittiyaṃ, bhāti, rattimābhāti candimā dha. pa. 387, disā bhanti virocamānā ma. ni. 1.503, daddallamānā ābhanti vi. va. 738; jā. 2.22.508, paṭibhāti, paṭibhanti, paṭibhātu, paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgā saṃ. ni. 5.197, tisso maṃ upamāyo paṭibhaṃsu ma. ni. 1.374, ratti vibhāti, vibhāyati.
anya-e0201n5:471: Mā-māne, dvittaṃ rasso ca, mamāyati, mamāyanti. Yemaṃ kāyaṃ mamāyanti, andhā bālā puthujjanā theragā. 575.
anya-e0201n5:472: Yā-gatiyaṃ, yāti, yanti, yāyati, yāyanti, yāyanta’ manuyāyanti jā. 2.22.1753, uyyāti, uyyanti, niyyāti, niyyanti dhīrā lokamhā, hitvā māraṃ savāhanaṃ. Anuyāti, anuyanti, anupariyāyati, anupariyāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:474: Vā-gati, gandhanesu, vāti devesu uttamo dha. pa. 56, vāto vāyati, vāyanti, nibbāti, nibbanti, nibbāyati, nibbāyanti, parinibbāti, parinibbāyati.
anya-e0201n5:478: Sā-assādana, tanukaraṇa, antakriyāsu, sāti, sāyati, sāyanti, pariyosāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:482: Kattu, kammani kyo, īuāgamo, hiyyoti hiyyati poso jā. 1.15.348, nihiyyati tassa yaso a. ni. 4.17; jā. 1.10.60, tvaṃ eko avahiyyasi, dvittaṃ rasso ca.
anya-e0201n5:484: Dvitte pubbesaṃ kavagga, hānaṃ cavagga, jā honti.
anya-e0201n5:489: Ṇāpimhi-hāpeti, hāpenti, hāpayati, hāpayanti, jahāpeti, jahāpenti, jahāpayati, jahāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:493: Hāto parassa ssa-kārassa ha hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:494: ‘‘Hāhisi tvaṃ jīvaloka’’nti jā. 1.5.36 pāḷi, hāhiti, hāhinti, hāhati, hāhanti, jahissati, hissati, aññamaññaṃ vadhitvāna, khippaṃ hissāma jīvitaṃ jā. 2.22.673.
anya-e0201n5:499: I-gatiyaṃ ajjhāyane ca, khi-khaye pakāsane ca, cicaye, ji-jaye, ḍī-vehāsagatiyaṃ, nī-naye, bhī-bhaye, lī-laye, sī-saye, mhi-hāse.
anya-e0201n5:500: Tyādyuppatti, kattari lo, eti, enti, esi, etha, emi, ema, veti, venti, sameti, samenti, abbheti, abbhenti, abhisameti, abhisamenti, aveti, aventi, samaveti, samaventi, apeti, apenti, upeti, upenti, anveti, anventi, acceti, accenti, pacceti, paccenti, ajjheti, ajjhenti, udeti, udenti, samudeti, samudenti, pariyeti, pariyenti, upayati, upayanti, accayati, accayanti, udayati, samudayati.
anya-e0201n5:501: Etu, sametu, entu, samentu, ehi, samehi, etha, sametha, etha byagghā nivattavho, paccupetha mahāvanaṃ jā. 1.3.66.
anya-e0201n5:502: Mahāvuttinā idhātumhā eyyādīnaṃ ekārassa lopo, na ca apatvā dukkhassantaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.107, vissāsaṃ eyya paṇḍito, yadā te pahiṇeyyāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya jā. 2.22.635.
anya-e0201n5:503: Īādimhi ‘paro kvacī’ti vibhattisaralopo, dhammaṃ abhisami, abhisamiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:504: ‘Eontā su’nti uṃssa suṃ, abhisamesuṃ, abhisamayuṃ, abhisamayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:507: ‘Etī’ti dhātuniddeso tisaddo, idhātumhā parassa ssakārassa hi hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:508: Ehiti, essati. Bodhirukkhamupehiti bu. vaṃ. 2.63, nerañjaramupehiti bu. vaṃ. 2.63, upessati, tadā ehinti me vasaṃ jā. 1.1.33, tato nibbānamehisi cūḷava. 382 tassuddānaṃ, na punaṃ jātijaraṃ upehisi dha. pa. 238. Suttavibhattena aññadhātūhipi, kathaṃ jīvihisi tvaṃ apa. thera 1.3.13, jāyihitippasādo jā. 2.17.145, paññāyihinti etā daharā jā. 2.17.197.
anya-e0201n5:509: Ssādimhi ‘‘sace puttaṃ siṅgālānaṃ, kukkurānaṃ adāhisī’’ti gavesitabbaṃ pāḷi, ‘adāhisī’ti ca adadissasetyattho.
anya-e0201n5:511: Khito yāgamo, vikappena yassa dvittaṃ, kappo khīyetha, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.304, ujjhāyanti khīyanti pārā. 88, avaṇṇaṃ pakāsentīti attho. Khiyyati, khiyyanti, āyu khiyyati maccānaṃ, kunnadīnaṃva odakaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.146.
anya-e0201n5:514: Nito parassa cissa ca-kārassa cho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:518: Sarantassa dhātussa dīgho hoti kyamhīti ikāru’kārānaṃ kyamhi vikappena dīgho.
anya-e0201n5:520: Ji-jaye, jeti, jenti, vijeti, vijenti, parājeti, parājenti, jayati, jayanti, vijayati, vijayanti, parājayati, parājayanti.
anya-e0201n5:521: Kamme kyamhi dīgho, na taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ avajīyati. Taṃ kho jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ nāvajīyati jā. 1.1.70.
anya-e0201n5:522: Ṇāpimhi pubbassaralopo vā, jāpeti, jāpayati. Yo na hanti na ghāteti, na jināti na jāpaye jā. 1.10.144. Jayāpeti, jayāpayati, jayāpīyati, jayāpīyanti, jayatu, jayantu.
anya-e0201n5:523: Īādimhi-ajesi, ajesuṃ, vijesi, vijesuṃ, ajayi, ajayuṃ, ajayiṃsu, vijayi, vijayuṃ, vijayiṃsu, jessati, vijessati, parājessati, jayissati, vijayissati, parājayissati.
anya-e0201n5:524: Ḍī-vehāsagatiyaṃ, sakuṇo ḍeti, ḍenti dī. ni. 1.215; a. ni. 4.198. Pāsaṃ oḍḍeti, oḍḍenti.
anya-e0201n5:525: Nī-naye , neti, nenti, vineti, vinenti, nayati, nayanti, vinayati, vinayanti.
anya-e0201n5:528: Ṇāpimhi āyādesassa rasso, nayāpeti, nayāpenti, nayāpayati, nayāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:530: Īādimhi-nesi, nesuṃ, vinesi, vinesuṃ, ānesi, ānesuṃ, anayi, nayi, anayiṃsu, nayiṃsu, ānayi, ānayiṃsu, vinayi, vinayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:532: Bhī-bhaye, bheti. Mā bhetha kiṃ socatha modathavho jā. 1.12.27, vibhemi etaṃ asādhuṃ, uggatejo hi brāhmaṇo jā. 2.17.103. Bhāyati, bhāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:533: Kārite mahāvuttinā sāgamo vā, bhīseti, bhīsayati, bhīsāpeti, bhīsāpayati. Bhikkhuṃ bhīseyya vā bhīsāpeyya vā pāci. 346-347.
anya-e0201n5:534: Sī-saye, seti, senti, atiseti, atisenti, sayati, sayanti.
anya-e0201n5:537: Ṇimhi-sāyeti, sāyayati, sāyesuṃ dīnamānasā apa. thera 2.54.48.
anya-e0201n5:538: Mhi-hāse , umheti, umhayati, vimheti, vimhayati, na naṃ umhayate disvā, na ca naṃ paṭinandati jā. 1.2.93.
anya-e0201n5:540: Kārite pubbassaralopo, sace maṃ nāganāsūrū, umhāyeyya pabhāvatī. Sace maṃ nāganāsūrū, pamhāyeyya pabhāvatī jā. 2.20.17.
anya-e0201n5:543: Cu-cavane, ju-sīghagamane, thu-abhitthavane, du-gatiyaṃ upatāpe ca, bhū-sattāyaṃ, yu-missane gatiyañca, ru-sadde, brū-viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, su-sandane janane ca, sū-pasavane, hu-dāne bhakkhane pūjāyaṃ sattiyañca, hū-sattāyaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:544: Tyādyuppatti, ‘kattari lo’ti lapaccayo, uvaṇṇassa avādeso, ‘dīgho sarassā’ti sakammikadhātūnaṃ kyamhi dīgho.
anya-e0201n5:549: ‘Bahula’nti adhikatattā kyamhi kvaci vuddhi, avādeso, abhitthavīyati, abhitthavīyanti, abhitthaviyyati, abhitthaviyyanti.
anya-e0201n5:556: Byañjane pare brūssa o na hoti.
anya-e0201n5:559: Brūto tissa ādimhi īu hoti. Īmhi pubbalopo.
anya-e0201n5:562: Ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇantānaṃ dhātūnaṃ kvaci iyaṅa, uvaṅa honti sare.
anya-e0201n5:563: Bruvanti, brunti vā. ‘‘Ajānantā no pabruntī’’ti pāḷi. Brūsi, brūtha, brūmi, brūma.
anya-e0201n5:565: Ti, antīsu brūssa āha hoti, tesañca ṭa, ṭū honti.
anya-e0201n5:567: Atrimā pāḷī-nibbānaṃ bhagavā āha, sabbaganthapamocanaṃ, āha tesañca yo nirodho mahāva. 60, yaṃ pare sukhato āhu, tadariyā āhu dukkhato. Yaṃ pare dukkhato āhu, tadariyā sukhato vidū su. ni. 767. Tattha ‘āhā’ti katheti. ‘Āhū’ti kathenti.
anya-e0201n5:568: Brūtu , brūvantu, brūhi maṅgalamuttamaṃ khu. pā. 5.2, brūtha, brūmi, brūma.
anya-e0201n5:570: Īādimhi sare pare brūssa ottaṃ, ossa ca avādeso, abravi, abravuṃ, abraviṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:577: Āhādesamhā parassa uvacanassa aṃsu hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:578: Te āhaṃsu, saccaṃ kirevamāhaṃsu, narā ekacciyā idha jā. 1.13.123.
anya-e0201n5:579: Su-sandane, nadī savati, savanti, ābhavaggā savanti.
anya-e0201n5:581: Hu-pūjāyaṃ, ‘parokkhāyañcā’ti dvittaṃ, ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti hassa jo, juhoti, juhonti.
anya-e0201n5:587: Eyyādimhi- ‘yuvaṇṇānamiyaṅauvaṅa sare’ti dhātvantassa uvādeso, huveyya, huveyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:588: Āādimhi-so ahuvā. Vaṇṇagandhaphalūpeto, amboyaṃ ahuvā pure jā. 1.2.71. Ahuvā te pure sakhā saṃ. ni. 1.50, te ahuvū, tvaṃ ahuvo, tumhe ahuvattha ma. ni. 1.215, jhāyatha bhikkhave mā pamādāttha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha, ahuva, ahuvaṃ vā, ahuvamhā. ‘‘Akaramhasa te kiccaṃ, yaṃ balaṃ ahuvamhase jā. 1.4.29. Ahuvamheva mayaṃ pubbe, na nāhuvamhā’’ti ma. ni. 1.180 pāḷiyo.
anya-e0201n5:590: Mahāvuttinā īlopo rasso ca. Ahudeva bhayaṃ ahu chambhitattaṃ. Ahudeva kukkuccaṃ, ahu vippaṭisāro pārā. 38. Ādīnavo pāturahu theragā. 269, dibbo ratho pāturahu.
anya-e0201n5:592: Hūto ñuṃvacanassa resuṃ hoti. Suttavibhattena mhāssa resumhā ca. ‘Rānubandhentasarādissā’ti dhātvantalopo.
anya-e0201n5:593: Te pubbe ahesuṃ. Uvādese ahuvuṃ, pubbassaralope ahuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:594: Atrimā pāḷī- sabbamhi taṃ araññamhi, yāvantettha dijā ahuṃ jā. 2.22.2425. Kūṭāgārasahassāni, sabbasoṇṇamayā ahuṃ apa. thera 1.1.407.
anya-e0201n5:595: Ossa si, ittha, ttho. Tvaṃ ahosi, ahuvi, ahuvittha, ahuvittho.
anya-e0201n5:596: Mahāvuttinā olopo rasso, mā bhoti kupitā ahu jā. 2.22.1931, māhu pacchānutāpinī saṃ. ni. 1.162, ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahosiṃ, kinnu kho ahosiṃ, kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ saṃ. ni. 2.20; ma. ni. 1.18, ahaṃ ahuviṃ, mayaṃ ahosimhā, ahosimha vā. Ahesumhā nu kho mayaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahesumhā, kinnu kho ahesumhā, kathaṃ nu kho ahesumhā ma. ni. 1.407. Mayaṃ pubbe ahuvimhā, ahumhā vā. ‘‘Mayaṃ pubbe dānapatino ahumhā’’ti jā. 2.22.1617 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:598: Mahāvuttinā mhāssa uñca. ‘‘Pañcasatā mayaṃ sabbā, tāvatiṃsupagā ahu’’nti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:599: Parachakke assa aṃ, ahaṃ pubbe ahuvaṃ, ahuva vā.
anya-e0201n5:601: Atrimā pāḷī- ‘‘ahaṃ kevaṭṭagāmasmiṃ, ahuṃ kevaṭṭadārako apa. thera 1.39.86, cakkavattī ahuṃ rājā, jambumaṇḍassa issaro. Sattakkhattuṃ mahābrahmā, vasavattī tadā ahuṃ. Muddhābhisitto khattiyo, manussādhipatī ahu’’nti. Mayaṃ ahuvimhe.
anya-e0201n5:604: Ssatyādimhi hūdhātussa he ca hohi ca hohi ca honti.
anya-e0201n5:605: Hessati , hessanti, hehissati, hehissanti, hohissati, hohissanti. Buddho hessaṃ sadevake bu. vaṃ. 2.55, anāgatamhi addhāne, hessāma sammukhā imaṃ bu. vaṃ. 2.74.
anya-e0201n5:606: 626.Dakkha sakkha hehi hohīhi lopoka. 480; rū. 490; nī. 961; ‘dakkhā hehihohilopo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n5:607: Etehi ādesehi ssassa lopo hoti vā. Suttavibhattena aññehipi ssalopo.
anya-e0201n5:608: Sakkhisi tvaṃ kuṇḍalini, maññisi khattabandhuni jā. 2.17.14. Na hi sakkhinti chettuṃ su. ni. 28, adhammo haññiti dhammamajja jā. 1.11.31, brahmadatto palāyiti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:610: Atrimā pāḷī-piyo ca me hehiti mālabhārī, ahañca naṃ mālinī ajjhupessaṃ jā. 1.15.197, tilodano hehiti sādhupakko jā. 1.8.2. Doso pemañca hehiti theragā. 719. Mama tvaṃ hehisi bhariyā jā. 1.14.27. Tato sukhī hohisi vītarāgo. Khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo dī. ni. 2.207 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:613: E-āgatiyaṃ gatiyañca, ke-sadde, khe-khādanu’paṭṭhānesu, ge-sadde, apapubba ce-pūjāyaṃ, jhe-cintāyaṃ dāha’jjhānesu ca, te-pālane, the-sadda, saṅghātesu, de-suddhi, niddāsu, pe-vuddhiyaṃ , bhe-bhaye, le-chedane, ve-gatiyaṃ tantasantāne ca, se-antakriyāyaṃ, hare-lajjāyaṃ, gile-kilamane, pale-gatiyaṃ, mile-hāniyaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:614: Ṇānubandhapaccayena vinā yesaṃ dhātūnaṃ āyādeso labbhati, te edantā nāma. Mahāvuttinā yalope sati ādantehi samānarūpaṃ, ādantānañca yāgame sati edantehi samānarūpaṃ, tasmā ādanta, edantā yebhuyyena samānarūpā bhavanti.
anya-e0201n5:615: Mahāvuttinā edantānaṃ tyādīsu tabbādīsu ca āyādeso, kvaci yalopo, e-āgatiyaṃ. Ayaṃ so sārathī eti jā. 2.22.51, sace enti manussattaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.49, lakkhaṇaṃ passa āyantaṃ, migasaṅghapurakkhataṃ jā. 1.1.11, yoga’māyanti maccuno saṃ. ni. 1.20, āyāmāvuso pārā. 228, āyāmānanda dī. ni. 2.186; pārā. 22; ma. ni. 1.273.
anya-e0201n5:616: Ettha edhātu āgaccha, gacchāmāti atthadvayaṃ vadati, yādhātuvasena āgaccha, yāmātipi atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0201n5:618: Kucchitā dhammā āyanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti kāyo, ‘āyo’ti vuccati vaḍḍhi, tato apeto apāyo, tena upeto upāyo, avayavadhammā samudenti etthāti samudāyo, paribyattaṃ āyanti etenāti pariyāyo.
anya-e0201n5:621: Khe-khādane, tiṇaṃ khāyati, vikkhāyati, undurā khāyanti, vikkhāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:622: Khe-upaṭṭhāne , khāyati, pakkhāyati, alakkhī viya khāyati.
anya-e0201n5:624: Apapubba ce-pūjāyaṃ, apacāyati, ye vuddha’mapacāyanti jā. 1.1.37.
anya-e0201n5:625: Jhe-cintāyaṃ, jhāyati, jhāyanti, pajjhāyati, pajjhāyanti, abhijjhāyati, abhijjhāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:626: Jhe-olokane, nijjhāyati, nijjhāyanti, upanijjhāyati, upanijjhāyanti, ujjhāyati, ujjhāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:629: Ṇāpimhi yalopo, kaṭṭhaṃ jhāpeti, jhāpenti, jhāpayati, jhāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:630: Jhe-ajjhayane saṃpubbo, mahāvuttinā niggahītassa jādeso, sajjhāyati, sajjhāyanti, mantaṃ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0201n5:636: Bhe-bhaye, bhāyati, bhāyanti, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno dha. pa. 129, bhāyasi, sace bhāyatha dukkhassa udā. 44, kinnu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi ma. ni. 1.381, nataṃ bhāyāmi āvuso, bhāyāma apa. therī. 2.2.458.
anya-e0201n5:638: Īādimhi-mā bhāyi, mā soci dī. ni. 2.207, mā cintayi.
anya-e0201n5:640: Le-chedane, tiṇaṃ lāyati, sāliṃ lāyati, lāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:649: Ṇi, ṇāpīnaṃ lopo hoti tesuṇi, ṇāpīsu paresu.
anya-e0201n5:650: Bhikkhu attanā vippakataṃ kuṭiṃ parehi pariyosāpeti pārā. 363. Ettha akammakattā dhātussa ‘kuṭi’nti ca ‘parehī’ti ca dve kammāni dvikkhattuṃ pavattehi kāritehi sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n5:652: Hare-lajjāyaṃ, harāyati, harāyanti, aṭṭiyāmi harāyāmi saṃ. ni. 1.165, harāyāma, harāyatīti hirī, mahāvuttinā upantassa ittaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:653: Gile-rujjane, gilāyati, piṭṭhi me āgilāyati cūḷava. 345; dī. ni. 3.300, gilāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:656: ‘‘Jhānaṃ, ujjhānaṃ, nijjhānaṃ, tāṇaṃ, parittāṇaṃ, vodānaṃ, niddānaṃ, gilāno, palāto, milātanti’’ādīsu yalopo.
anya-e0201n5:662: Atha byañjanantadhāturūpāni vuccante. Tāni ca avuddhika, savuddhikavasena duvidhāni honti. Tattha avuddhikāni tāva vuccante.
anya-e0201n5:663: Khipa, guha, tuda, disa, pisa, phusa, likha, vadhādi.
anya-e0201n5:664: Idha dhātūnaṃ antassaro uccāraṇattho, so rūpavidhāne nappayujjate.
anya-e0201n5:666: Tudādīhi kānubandho apaccayo hoti. Kānubandho avuddhidīpanattho.
anya-e0201n5:667: Khipa-khipane, khipati, pakkhipati, ukkhipati, okkhipati, nikkhipati, vikkhipati, paṭikkhipati, saṃkhipati.
anya-e0201n5:669: Kārite-khipeti , khipayati, khipāpeti, khipāpayati, khepeti, khepayati vā, udakaṃ khepeti, taṇhaṃ khepeti, khayāpetīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:672: Kārite gussa dīgho, gūheti, gūhayati, gūhāpeti, gūhāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:680: ‘Tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti dassa jattaṃ. ‘Vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, tujjati.
anya-e0201n5:682: Disī-uddisane, uddisanaṃ sarūpato kathanaṃ. Uddisati, pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti mahāva. 152, niddisati, niddisanti, apadisati, apadisanti.
anya-e0201n5:684: Kārite-ācariyo sissaṃ pāḷidhammaṃ uddisāpeti, uddisāpayati, vācetīti attho. Pāṭhesu pana sadvayampi dissati.
anya-e0201n5:685: Nuda-khipane , nudati, panudati, vinodeti, paṭivinodeti vā.
anya-e0201n5:691: Phusa-samphasse pattiyañca, phusati, phusanti dhīrā nibbānaṃ dha. pa. 23, vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyya pārā. 409; cūḷava. 344.
anya-e0201n5:698: Yamhi dhassa jhattaṃ, yassa pubbarūpaṃ. ‘Catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti jhassa tatiyajattaṃ, vajjhati, vajjhanti, vajjhare. Ime sattā haññantu vā vajjhantu vā ma. ni. 1.60.
anya-e0201n5:699: Kārite-vadheti, vadhayati, vadhāpeti, vadhāpayati, sāmiko purisaṃ maggaṃ gameti, gamayati, gamāpeti, gamāpayati iccādīnipi idha vattabbāni.
anya-e0201n5:703: Asa-bhuvi, āsa-nivāse upavesane ca, isu-icchā, kantīsu, kamu-padagamane, kusa-akkose, gamu-gatimhi, jaravayohānimhi, jana-janane, mara-pāṇacāge, yamu-uparame, ruda-assuvimocane kandane ca, ruha-janane, labha-lābhe, vaca, vada-viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vida-ñāṇe, vasa-nivāse, visapavesane, sada-gatyā’vasāne, hana-hiṃsāyaṃ, haraharaṇe.
anya-e0201n5:704: Tyādyuppatti, kattari lo, asa-bhuvi, sattāyanti attho.
anya-e0201n5:706: Atthito parassati, tūnaṃ tassa tho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:707: ‘Pararūpamayakāre byañjane’ti suttena byañjane pare dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ, ‘catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti suttena pararūpassa dutiyassa paṭhamattaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:709: Ettha ca ‘‘atthi tvaṃ etarahi, na tvaṃ natthi, atthi ahaṃ etarahi, nāhaṃ natthi, puttā matthi dhanā matthi dha. pa. 62, atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā’’ti khu. pā. 3.dvitiṃsākāra ādīsu atthisaddo ākhyātapaṭirūpako kattuvācako nipāto.
anya-e0201n5:710: ‘‘Atthīti kho kaccāyana ayameko anto, natthīti dutiyo anto’’ti saṃ. ni. 2.15 ca ‘‘atthipaccayo, natthipaccayo’’ti paṭṭhā. 1.1.paccayuddesa ca evamādīsu nāmapaṭirūpako. Tathā natthisaddo.
anya-e0201n5:711: Tumhi-vipassissa ca namatthu dī. ni. 3.287, namo te buddha vīratthu saṃ. ni. 1.90, ettha ca ‘‘dhiratthumaṃ pūtikāya’’nti ādīsu atthusaddo nipāto.
anya-e0201n5:713: Nta, māna, anti, antu, iyā, iyuṃsu atthissa ādilopo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:717: Manussosi mahāva. 126, purisosi mahāva. 126. Himhi dīgho, tvaṃ paṇḍito āhi, bhavāhīti attho. Tavibhattīsu dhātvantassa pararūpaṃ, tumhe attha, kaccittha parisuddhā pārā. 233. Tvādimhi-mā pamādattha ma. ni. 1.88, 215, tumhe samaggā attha.
anya-e0201n5:719: Atthito paresaṃ mi, mānaṃ mhi, mhā honti vā, atthissa ca aṭa hoti.
anya-e0201n5:721: Tvādimhi-ahaṃ iminā puññena anāgate paññavā amhi, mayaṃ paññavanto amha.
anya-e0201n5:723: Etesu mi, mesu atthissa sassa so hoti. Pararūpanisedhanatthamidaṃ suttaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:724: Ahaṃ paṇḍito asmi, mayaṃ paṇḍitā asma.
anya-e0201n5:725: Tvādimhi-ahaṃ anāgate paññavā asmi, mayaṃ paññavanto asma.
anya-e0201n5:727: 634.Atthiteyyādichannaṃ sa su sasi satha saṃsāmaka. 571, 517; rū. 624, 488; nī. 830, 1105; ‘atthiteyyādicchannaṃ sasusasatha saṃ sāma’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n5:728: ‘Atthī’ti dhātuniddeso ti-kāro, atthito paresaṃ eyyādīnaṃ channaṃ sādayo honti.
anya-e0201n5:729: Evamassa vacanīyo pārā. 411, evamassu vacanīyā pārā 418, tvaṃ assasi, tumhe assatha, ahaṃ assaṃ, mayaṃ assāma.
anya-e0201n5:730: Assunipātopi bahuṃ dissati, tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavanti khu. pā. 6.10, kenassu taratī oghaṃ, kenassu tarati aṇṇavaṃ saṃ. ni. 1.246. ‘‘Kiṃsu chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kiṃsu chetvā na socatī’’ti saṃ. ni. 1.71 ettha niggahītamhā saṃyogādilopo.
anya-e0201n5:732: Atthito eyyādīsu ādimhi dvinnaṃ iyā, iyuṃ honti. ‘Ntamānantantiyiyuṃsū…’tiādilopo.
anya-e0201n5:733: So siyā, te siyuṃ, ete dve nipātāpi honti. ‘‘Vedanākkhandho siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato’’ti vibha. 152 ādīsu ekaccoti attho.
anya-e0201n5:734: ‘‘Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā’’ti paṭṭhā. 1.1.35-38 ādīsu kinnūti attho.
anya-e0201n5:736: Mahāvuttinā eyyuṃ, eyyamiccetesaṃ iyaṃsu, iyaṃ honti, ādilopo, siyaṃsu dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā ma. ni. 3.35, evaṃrūpo siyaṃ ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃvedano siyaṃ, evaṃsañño siyaṃ ma. ni. 3.274.
anya-e0201n5:740: So āsi, te āsuṃ, āsiṃsu, tvaṃ āsi, tumhe āsittha, ahaṃ āsiṃ. Tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃvaṇṇo dī. ni. 1.245; ma. ni. 1.68. Mayaṃ āsimha, āsimhā.
anya-e0201n5:742: Aādiparokkhāyañca āādihiyyattaniyañca ssādīsu bhavissanti, kālātipattīsu ca atthissa bhū hoti. Idañca suttaṃ atthissa etāsaṃ vibhattīnampi sādhāraṇakaraṇatthaṃ. Rūpampi bhūrūpameva.
anya-e0201n5:743: So babhūva, te babhūvu, so abhavā, te abhavū, so bhavissati, te bhavissanti, so abhavissā, te abhavissaṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:745: Tyādivajjitesu ntavajjitesu ca paccayesu atthissa bhū hoti. Etena tyādi, tvādi, eyyādi, īādisaṅkhātāsu catūsu vibhattīsu ntapaccaye ca atthissa bhūādeso natthi, sesāsu catūsu vibhattīsu ca ntavajjitesu tabbādīsu ca atthissa bhūādeso labbhatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0201n5:746: Āsa-upavesane. Guruṃ upāsati, payirupāsati, upāsanti, payirupāsanti.
anya-e0201n5:748: Kārite-mātā puttaṃ guruṃ upāseti, payirupāseti, upāsayati, payirupāsayati.
anya-e0201n5:749: Īādimhi-upāsi, payirupāsi, upāsiṃsu, payirupāsiṃsu, upāsuṃ, payirupāsuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:752: Gamu, yamu, isu, āsa, disānaṃ anto byañjano ṅānubandho ccho hoti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n5:753: Gacchanto, niyacchanto, icchanto, acchanto, dicchantoti iminā tyādīsu āsassa ccho, acchati, acchanti, so acchi, te acchiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:756: Antassa samīpe pavattatīti upanto, byañjanantadhātūnaṃ pubbassaro ‘upanto’ti vuccati, lahubhūtassa upantabhūtassa ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇassa e, ovuddhī honti.
anya-e0201n5:758: Lahussāti kiṃ? Jīvati, dhūpati, ikkhati, sukkhati.
anya-e0201n5:759: Upantassāti kiṃ? Siñcati, bhuñjati, niggahītāgamena byavahitattā upanto na hoti.
anya-e0201n5:761: Iminā issa evuddhi hoti, esati, anvesati, pariyesati.
anya-e0201n5:765: Isu-icchāyaṃ, cchādeso, icchati, icchanti, sampaṭicchati, sampaṭicchanti.
anya-e0201n5:768: Kamme-icchāpīyati, icchāpayīyati, so icchi, te icchiṃsu, icchissati, icchissanti.
anya-e0201n5:769: Kamu-vijjhane, gambhīresu ṭhānesu ñāṇaṃ kamati, na satthaṃ kamati, na visaṃ kamati, na aggi kamati a. ni. 8.1, na vijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:770: Kamu-padagamane , pakkamati, apakkamati, upakkamati, vikkamati, abhikkamati, paṭikkamati, atikkamati, saṅkamati, okkamati.
anya-e0201n5:772: Nimhā parassa kamassa kassa kho hoti. ‘Ādissā’ti saṅketattā kassāti ñāyati.
anya-e0201n5:776: Byañjanantassa dhātussa ādimhi a-kārassa āvuddhi hoti ṇānubandhe paccaye. ‘Bahula’nti adhikatattā ṇāpimhi āvuddhi natthi.
anya-e0201n5:777: Pakkāmeti, pakkāmayati, nikkhāmeti, nikkhāmayati, nikkhamāpeti, nikkhamāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:778: Īādimhi mahāvuttinā ādidīgho vā hoti, so pakkami, pakkāmi, idaṃ vatvāna pakkāmi, maddī sabbaṅgasobhaṇā jā. 2.22.1857, pakkamuṃ, pakkāmuṃ, sammodamānā pakkāmuṃ, aññamaññaṃ piyaṃ vadā jā. 2.22.1868, pakkamiṃsu, pakkāmiṃsu, pakkamaṃsu, pakkāmaṃsu, pakkamissati, pakkamissanti, pakkamissare.
anya-e0201n5:779: Āpubbo kusa-akkose, lahupantattā vuddhi, akkosati, akkosanti. Papubbo āmantane, pakkosati, pakkosanti. Vipubbo uccasadde, vikkosati, vikkosanti. Paṭipubbo nīvāraṇe, paṭikkosati, paṭikkosanti.
anya-e0201n5:782: Kusato ruhato ca parassa īssa cchi hoti.
anya-e0201n5:783: Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ dha. pa. 3-4, idañca rūpaṃ kudha, kupadhātūhipi sādhenti, evaṃ sati ‘‘akkocchi me’’ti pāṭho siyā. Akkosi, akkosiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:784: Gamu gatimhi, kattari lo, ‘ūlasse’ti lassa ettaṃ, gameti, gamenti. Avapubbo ñāṇe, avagameti, avagamenti, adhipubbo ñāṇe lābhe ca, adhigameti, adhigamenti. Vipubbo vigame, vigameti, vigamenti.
anya-e0201n5:786: Pubbarūpatte-gammati, gammanti, adhigammati, adhigammanti, adhigammare, adhigammate, adhigammante, adhigammare.
anya-e0201n5:787: Kārite vuddhi natthi, gameti, gamayati, gamāpeti, gamāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:789: Hiyyattanimhi-so agamā, gamā, te agamū, gamū, tvaṃ agamo, agama, agami, tumhe agamuttha, ahaṃ agamiṃ, gamiṃ, mayaṃ agamamhā, gamamhā, agamumhā, gamumhā, so agamattha, te agamatthuṃ, tvaṃ agamase, tumhe agamavhaṃ, ahaṃ agamaṃ, mayaṃ agamamhase.
anya-e0201n5:790: Ajjhattanimhi īādīsu ikārāgamo, so agamī, gamī.
anya-e0201n5:792: Mahāvuttinā ākārena saha sāgamo, so agamāsi, gāmaṃ agamāsi, nagaraṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0201n5:793: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā īssa ttho, so gāmaṃ agamittho, gamittho, te agamuṃ, gamuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:794: ‘Uṃssiṃsvaṃsū’ti iṃsu, aṃsu, te agamiṃsu, gamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, gamaṃsu, tvaṃ agamo, gamo.
anya-e0201n5:795: ‘Ossa a i ttha ttho’ ‘sī’ti suttāni, tvaṃ agama, gama, agami, gami, agamittha, gamittha, agamittho, gamittho, agamāsi, gamāsi, tumhe agamittha.
anya-e0201n5:796: ‘Mhātthānamuu’iti uttaṃ, tumhe agamuttha, gamuttha, ahaṃ agamiṃ, gamiṃ, agamāsiṃ, gamāsiṃ, mayaṃ agamimhā, gamimhā.
anya-e0201n5:797: Rassatte-agamimha, gamimha, agamumhā, gamumhā, agamumha, gamumha, agamāsimhā, gamāsimhā, agamāsimha, gamāsimha.
anya-e0201n5:800: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā tthatte-so agamittha, gamittha, te agamū, gamū.
anya-e0201n5:801: Rassatte-agamu, gamu, tvaṃ agamise, gamise, tumhe agamivhaṃ, gamivhaṃ, ahaṃ agama, gama, agamaṃ, gamaṃ vā, agamimhe, gamimhe.
anya-e0201n5:802: Kamme-agamīyi, agammi, agamīyittho, agammittho, agamīyuṃ, gamīyuṃ, agamīyiṃsu, gamīyiṃsu, agammuṃ, gammuṃ, agammiṃsu, gammiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:804: Kārite-agamāpayi, gamāpayi, agamāpesi, gamāpesi, agamāpayuṃ, gamāpayuṃ, agamāpayiṃsu, gamāpayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:806: Āādimhi īādimhi ca gamissa massa ā hoti. Saralopo.
anya-e0201n5:807: So agā, te agū, tvaṃ ago, tumhe aguttha, ahaṃ agaṃ, mayaṃ agumhā.
anya-e0201n5:808: Īādimhi īsaralopo, agā devāna santike jā. 1.14.205, vāyaso anupariyagā su. ni. 449.
anya-e0201n5:809: Āpubbo āgamane, anavhito tato āgā jā. 1.5.21, sopā’gā samitiṃ vanaṃ dī. ni. 2.335.
anya-e0201n5:810: Adhipubbo paṭilābhe, ajjhagā amataṃ santiṃ vi. va. 846, taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā dha. pa. 154.
anya-e0201n5:811: Atipubbo upādhipubbo ca titikkame, nakkhattaṃ paṭimānentaṃ, attho bālaṃ upajjhagā jā. 1.1.49. Khaṇo ve mā upajjhagā.
anya-e0201n5:812: Etāni o, avacanānaṃ lope sati tumha’mhayogepi labhanti, aguṃ, agiṃsu, agaṃsu. Samantā vijjutā āguṃ jā. 2.22.2264, tepā’guṃsamitiṃ vanaṃ (gavesitabbaṃ), visesaṃ ajjhagaṃsute dī. ni. 2.354, asesaṃ parinibbanti, asesaṃ dukkhamajjhaguṃ itivu. 93, sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ upajjhaguṃ paṭi. ma. 1.236; ma. ni. 3.271. Ajjhago, ajjhaga, ajjhagi, ajjhaguttha, ajjhagiṃ, ajjhagimhā, ajjhagumhā, agā, āgā, anvagā, ajjhagā, upajjhagā, agū, āgū. Āgū devā yasassino dī. ni. 2.340, cittassa ekadhammassa, sabbeva vasamanvagū saṃ. ni. 1.61. Cetā haniṃsu vedabbaṃ, sabbe te byasanamajjhagū jā. 1.1.48.
anya-e0201n5:813: Parokkhāyaṃ ādissa dvittaṃ, ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti pubbassa cavaggo. So jagama, mahāvuttinā upantassa dīgho, kvaci assa ittaṃ, ‘‘rājā dudīpo jagāmi magga’’nti jā. 2.22.911; ‘rājā dudīpopi jagāma saggaṃ’ pāḷi. So jagāma, te jagāmu, tvaṃ jagame.
anya-e0201n5:814: Byañjanādimhi ikārāgamo, tumhe jagamittha, ahaṃ jagamaṃ, mayaṃ jagamimha, so jagamittha, te jagamire, tvaṃ jagamittho, tumhe jagamivho, ahaṃ jagamiṃ, mayaṃ jagamimhe.
anya-e0201n5:816: Parachakke-so gamissate, te gamissante, gamissare, tvaṃ gamissase, tumhe gamissavhe, ahaṃ gamissaṃ, mayaṃ gamissāmhe.
anya-e0201n5:818: ‘Āīūmhāssāssāmhānaṃ vā’ti ssā, ssāmhānaṃ rasso, agamissa, gamissa, te agamissaṃsu, gamissaṃsu, tvaṃ agamisse, gamisse.
anya-e0201n5:819: ‘Eyyāthasse’ iccādinā ssessa attaṃ, tvaṃ agamissa, gamissa, tumhe agamissatha, gamissatha, ahaṃ agamissaṃ, gamissaṃ, mayaṃ agamissāmhā, gamissāmhā, agamissāmha, gamissāmha.
anya-e0201n5:820: ‘Gama vada dānaṃ ghammavajjadajjā’ti sabbavibhattīsu gamissa ghammo, ghammati, ghammanti.
anya-e0201n5:822: Mahāvuttinā gagghādeso vā, tvaṃ yena yeneva gagghasi, phāsuṃyeva gagghasi a. ni. 8.63.
anya-e0201n5:823: ‘Gamayamisāsadisānaṃ vācchaṅa’ iti suttena sabbavibhattīsu gamissa massa ccho, gacchati, gacchanti, gacchare.
anya-e0201n5:825: Kārite-gacchāpeti, gacchāpayati. Gacchatu, gacchantu, gaccheyya, gaccheyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:827: ‘Eyyeyyāseyyaṃnaṃ ṭe’iti suttena eyya, eyyāsi, eyyaṃvibhattīnaṃ ettaṃ, so gacche, tvaṃ gacche, ahaṃ gacche.
anya-e0201n5:830: Īādimhi-agacchi, gacchi, agacchuṃ, gacchuṃ, agacchiṃsu, gacchiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:832: Āādīsu īādīsu ca ḍaṃsassa ca anto byañjano ñchaṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n5:833: So agañchā, gañchā. Tathā agañchū, gacchū.
anya-e0201n5:835: Tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo su. ni. 985. Khippameva upāgañchi, yattha sammati temiyo jā. 2.22.73. Te agañchuṃ, gañchuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:837: 646.Labha vasa chida gama bhida rudānaṃ cchaṅaka. 481; rū. 524; nī. 966, 968.
anya-e0201n5:838: Ssena saha etesaṃ cchaṅa hoti vā ssayuttāsu vibhattīsu, suttavibhattena susassa ca, ‘‘nadīva avasucchatī’’ti jā. 2.22.2140 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:839: Lacchati, labhissati, alacchā, alabhissā, vacchati, vasissati, avacchā, avasissā, checchati, chindissati, acchecchā, acchindissā, bhecchati, bhindissati, abhecchā, abhindissā, rucchati, rodissati, arucchā, arodissāti.
anya-e0201n5:840: Iminā ssayuttāsu dvīsu vibhattīsu ssena saha gamissa massa ccho, gacchati, gacchissati, gacchanti, gacchissanti, ahaṃ gacchaṃ, gacchissaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:841: Atrimā pāḷī-gacchaṃ pāraṃ samuddassa, kassaṃ purisakāriyaṃ jā. 2.22.131, tassāhaṃ santikaṃ gacchaṃ, so me satthā bhavissati, sabbāni abhisambhossaṃ, gacchaññeva rathesabha jā. 2.22.1832, vedhabyaṃ kaṭukaṃ loke, gacchaññeva rathesabha jā. 2.22.1835.
anya-e0201n5:845: Jara, sadānaṃ saramhā īmaāgamo hoti vāti īmaāgamo.
anya-e0201n5:849: Etesaṃ iyaṅa hoti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n5:854: Janī-pātubhāve, mahāvuttinā sabbavibhattīsu nassa yādeso ādidīgho ca, jāyati, upajāyati, vijāyati, jāyanti, jāyare, pajāyanti, pajāyare, upajāyanti, upajāyare.
anya-e0201n5:855: Kārite vuddhi natthi, janeti, janenti, janayati, janayanti.
anya-e0201n5:856: Kamme-janīyati, janīyanti, jāyatu, jāyantu, jāyeyya, jāyeyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:858: Īādimhi-ajāyi, ajāyiṃsu, vijāyi, vijāyiṃsu, ajani, jani vā.
anya-e0201n5:859: Kārite-ajanesi, janesi, ajanayi, janayi, ajanesuṃ, janesuṃ, ajanayuṃ, janayuṃ, ajanayiṃsu, janayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:864: Ā , īādīsu ‘ḍaṃsassa ca ñchaṅa’ iti suttaṃ, niggahītalopo, aḍañchā, ḍañchā, aḍañchi, ḍañchi.
anya-e0201n5:866: Kamme yamhi ‘hassa vipallāso’ti pubbāparavipallāso, agginā gāmo dayhati, dayhanti.
anya-e0201n5:873: Disadhātussa passa ca dassa ca dasa ca da ca dakkha cāti ete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n5:874: Vipassanā, vipassī bhagavā, sudassī, piyadassī, atthadassī, dhammadassī, sudassaṃ vajjamaññesaṃ dha. pa. 252, sudassananagaraṃ, mahāsudassano nāma rājā dī. ni. 2.242.
anya-e0201n5:875: Dasādese-catusaccaddaso nātho vibha. aṭṭha. suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā, duddaso dhammo mahāva. 7; dī. ni. 2.64, attano pana duddasaṃ dha. pa. 252, so ve bhikkhu dhammadasoti vuccati gavesitabbaṃ. Passa dhammaṃ durājānaṃ, sammuḷhettha aviddasū. Daṭṭhabbaṃ, daṭṭhā, daṭṭhunti.
anya-e0201n5:876: Iminā suttena disassa sabbavibhattīsu yathārahaṃ passa, dassa, dakkhādesā honti, ā, īādīsu dasa, dādesā honti, ‘‘dissati, dissantī’’ti rūpāni pana yassa pubbarūpattena idha kamme sijjhanti, divādigaṇe kattari sijjhanti. Mahāvuttinā addassa, dissādesāpi honti. Atrimā pāḷī-yaṃ vāsavaṃ addassāmaṃ jā. 1.6.112; ‘addasāma’, ye mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ addassāma gavesitabbaṃ, api me mātaraṃ adassatha ma. ni. 2.356, dissanti bālā abyattā mahāva. 82, mayi ime dhammā sandissanti, ahañca imesu dhammesu sandissāmi ma. ni. 3.253, nimittāni padissanti, tāni ajja padissareti bu. vaṃ. 2.82, tasmā tyādīsupi ‘‘adassati, adassanti, adassasi, adassatha, adassāmi, addassāmā’’ti yujjanti.
anya-e0201n5:877: Kārite ṇimhi dassādeso, dasseti, dassayati, nidasseti, nidassayati, sandasseti, sandassayati.
anya-e0201n5:878: Kamme-dassīyati, dassīyanti, nidassīyati, nidassīyanti, sandassīyati, sandassīyanti, dakkhati, dakkhanti.
anya-e0201n5:880: ‘Gamayamisāsadisānaṃ cchaṅa’ iti cchādese- dicchati, dicchanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:881: Passati, passanti, dakkhati, dakkhanti, passīyati, passīyanti, dakkhīyati, dakkhīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:882: Yassa pubbarūpatte-dissati, dissanti, dissate, dissante, uddissate, uddissante, niddissate, niddissante, apadissate, apadissante.
anya-e0201n5:885: Passatu , passantu, dakkhatu, dakkhantu, passeyya, passeyyuṃ, dakkheyya, dakkheyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:886: Eyyāmassa emu ca antassa u ca honti. ‘‘Kattha passemu khattiyaṃ jā. 2.2.1947, dakkhemu te nivesana’’nti jā. 1.15.254 (…nivesanāni) pāḷi. Passeyyāma, passeyyāmu, dakkheyyāma, dakkheyyāmu.
anya-e0201n5:888: Dasa, dādesesu dakārassa dvittaṃ, addasā kho bhagavā mahāva. 9; dī. ni. 2.69; saṃ. ni. 1.159, addasā kho āyasmā ānando ma. ni. 1.364.
anya-e0201n5:889: Rassatte-tamaddasa mahābrahmā, nisinnaṃ samhi vesmani jā. 1.16.148. Te addasū. Rassatte-addasu, āmantayassu vo putte, mā te mātaramaddasu jātake ‘‘āmantayassu te putte, mā te mātara maddasuṃ’’.
anya-e0201n5:891: Rassatte-adda. Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage jā. 2.22.2105. Yo dukkhaṃ sukhato adda, dukkhamaddakkhi sallato dī. ni. 2.368.
anya-e0201n5:892: Īādimhi-apassi, passi, apassī, passī, apassiṃsu, passiṃsu, apassi, passi, apassittha, passittha, apassiṃ, passiṃ, apassimhā, passimhā.
anya-e0201n5:893: Dassādese-addassi, addassuṃ, addassiṃsu, addassaṃsu, addassi, addassittha, addassiṃ, addassimhā.
anya-e0201n5:896: Parachakke-addasā , addasū, ahaṃ addasaṃ, mayaṃ addassimhe. Addasaṃ kāma te mūlaṃ, saṅkappā kāma jāyasi jā. 1.8.39.
anya-e0201n5:897: Kvaci sāgame ākārāgamo, so addasāsi, te addasāsuṃ, ahaṃ addasāsiṃ, mayaṃ adasāsimha. Yaṃ addasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ, desentaṃ dhammamuttamaṃ theragā. 287. Athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ, satthāramakutobhayaṃ theragā. 912.
anya-e0201n5:898: Mahāvuttinā iṃssa imhi hoti, pathe addasāsimhi bhojaputte jā. 2.17.146.
anya-e0201n5:900: Dakkhādese‘dakkha sakkha hehi’iccādinā ssassalopo, dakkhati, dakkhanti, dakkhiti, dakkhinti, dakkhissati, dakkhissanti.
anya-e0201n5:903: ‘Jaramarānamiyaṅa’iti iyādeso, miyati, miyanti, amhaṃ daharā na miyyare jā. 1.10.97.
anya-e0201n5:904: Kārite ‘assā ṇānubandhe’ti āvuddhi, māreti, mārenti, mārayati, mārayanti, mārāpeti, mārāpenti, mārāpayati, mārāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:905: Yamu-uparame, yamati, yamanti. Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase. Ettha ca ‘yamāmase’ti viramāmase, maraṇaṃ gacchāmaseti attho.
anya-e0201n5:909: ‘Gamayamisāsadisānaṃ vā cchaṅa’iti massa cchādeso, niyacchati, niyacchanti.
anya-e0201n5:913: Ṇāpimhi na vuddhi, niyamāpeti, niyamāpayati, vavatthapetīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:915: Ssatyādimhi-‘labhavasachidagamabhidānaṃ cchaṅa’iti ssena saha dassa cchādeso, sā nūna kapaṇā ammā, cirarattāya rucchati jā. 2.22.2136. Koñjī samuddatīreva, kapaṇā nūna rucchati jā. 2.21.113. Sā nūna kapaṇā ammā, ciraṃ rucchati assame jā. 2.22.2138, kaṃ nva’jja chātā tasitā, uparucchanti dārakā jā. 2.22.2153. Rodissati, rodissanti, rucchati, rucchanti.
anya-e0201n5:917: Ruha-pāpuṇane, ruhati, ruhanti, āruhati, āruhanti, ārohati, ārohanti, abhiruhati, abhiruhanti, oruhati, oruhanti, orohati, orohanti.
anya-e0201n5:919: ‘Hassa vipallāso’ti ha, yānaṃ vipariyāyo, āruyhati, oruyhati.
anya-e0201n5:923: Yassa pubbarūpatte ‘catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti saṃyogādissa catutthassa tatiyattaṃ, labbhati, labbhanti, labbhare.
anya-e0201n5:926: Labhamhā paresaṃ iṃ, īnaṃ kamena thaṃ, thā honti vā, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ, saṃyogādissa dutiyassa paṭhamattaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:927: Ahaṃ alatthaṃ, alabhiṃ vā, so alattha, alabhi vā.
anya-e0201n5:928: Mahāvuttinā uṃssa thuṃ, thaṃsu honti, mhāssa ca thamhā, thuṃmhā honti, te bhagavato santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca alatthuṃ dī. ni. 2.77, satiṃ paccalatthuṃ, viparītasaññaṃ paccalatthuṃ, te satiṃ paccalatthaṃsu, agamamhā kho tava gehaṃ, tattha neva dānaṃ alatthamhā ma. ni. 2.300 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ), akkosameva alatthamhā, mayañca alatthamhā savanāya, alatthumhā vā. Dhātvantassa ccho ca. Tadāhaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, paṭilacchiṃ ayoniso jā. 1.16.204.
anya-e0201n5:929: Ssatyādimhi-‘labhavasa chida gama bhida rudānaṃ cchaṅa’iti suttena ssena saha dhātvantassa cchādeso, lacchati, labhissati, lacchanti, labhissanti, lacchasi, labhissasi, lacchatha, labhissatha, lacchāmi, labhissāmi, lacchāma, labhissāma. Lacchāma putte jīvantā, arogā ca bhavāmase jā. 2.22.2260.
anya-e0201n5:933: Yassa pubbarūpatte ‘assū’ti suttena ādimhi akārassa uttaṃ, vuccati, vuccanti, vuccare, vuccate, vuccante, vuccare.
anya-e0201n5:934: Kārite-vāceti, vācenti, vācayati, vācayanti, vācāpeti, vācāpenti, vācāpayati, vācāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:936: Mahāvuttinā ākārena saha sāgamo, avacāsi, vacāsi, avacuṃ, vacuṃ, avaciṃsu, vaciṃsu, tvaṃ avaco, avaca, avaci, avacāsi, avacittha, avacittho, tumhe avacittha.
anya-e0201n5:937: ‘Mhāthānamuña’iti suttaṃ, tumhe avacuttha, vacuttha, ahaṃ avaciṃ, vaciṃ, avacāsiṃ, vacāsiṃ, mayaṃ avacimhā, vacimhā, avacimha, vacimha vā, mayaṃ avacumhā, vacumhā, so avacā, vacā.
anya-e0201n5:938: Rassatte-avaca, avacittha, vacittha vā, ahaṃ avacaṃ, avaca, vaca vā, mayaṃ avacimhe, vacimhe.
anya-e0201n5:941: So avoci, te avocuṃ, avociṃsu, tvaṃ avoci, tumhe avocuttha, ahaṃ avociṃ, mayaṃ avocumhā, so avoca, rasso, bhagavā etadavoca udā. 20.
anya-e0201n5:943: 653.Vacabhujamucavisānaṃ kkhaṅaka. 481; rū. 524; nī. 963; ‘bhuja muca vaca visānaṃ kkhaṅa (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n5:944: Ssena saha vacādīnaṃ anto byañjano kkhaṅa hoti vā ssayuttāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0201n5:945: Vakkhati , vacissati, vakkhanti, vakkhare, vacissanti, vacissare, vakkhasi, vakkhatha, vakkhāmi, vakkhāma, vakkhate, vakkhante, vakkhase, vakkhavhe, ahaṃ vakkhaṃ, vacissaṃ, mayaṃ vakkhāmhe, vacissāmhe.
anya-e0201n5:946: ‘Ssenā’ti adhikārena vinā dhātvantassa kkhādesopi labbhati, vakkhissati, vakkhissanti.
anya-e0201n5:948: Vada-viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vadati, vadanti, ovadati, ovadanti, vadasi, vadatha, vadāmi, vadāma.
anya-e0201n5:949: Lassa ette-vadeti, vadenti, vadesi, vadetha, vademi, vadema.
anya-e0201n5:951: Dassa cavaggatte yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, vajjati, vajjanti, ovajjati, ovajjanti.
anya-e0201n5:952: Kārite-bheriṃ vādeti, vādenti, vādayati, vādayanti, guruṃ abhivādeti, abhivādenti, abhivādesi, abhivādetha, abhivādemi, abhivādema.
anya-e0201n5:953: Mahāvuttinā assa ittaṃ, abhivādiyāmi, abhivādiyāma, abhivādayāmi, abhivādayāma vā, abhivandāmi, abhivandāmāti attho. Vandanto hi ‘‘sukhī hotū’’ti abhimaṅgalavacanaṃ vadāpeti nāma, tathāvacanañca vandanīyassa vattaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:955: ‘Gamavadadānaṃ ghammavajjadajjā vā’ti vajjādeso, ‘ūlasse’ti lassa ettaṃ, vajjeti, vajjenti.
anya-e0201n5:958: Eyyādimhi-‘eyyeyyāseyyaṃnaṃṭe’iti eyyādīnaṃ ekavacanānaṃ ettaṃ, vade, vadeyya, vajje, vajjeyya, vadeyyuṃ, vajjeyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:959: Vajjādese mahāvuttinā eyyassa āttaṃ, eyyumādīnaṃ eyyasaddassa lopo, so vajjā, te vajjuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:960: Eyyādīnaṃ yyāsaddassa lopo vā, tvaṃ vajjāsi, vajjesi, tumhe vajjātha, vajjetha, ahaṃ vajjāmi, vajjemi, mayaṃ vajjāma, vajjema, ahaṃ vajjaṃ, mayaṃ vajjāmhe, vajjeyyāmhe.
anya-e0201n5:961: Atrimā pāḷī-vajjuṃ vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā jā. 1.3.33, ammaṃ ārogyaṃ vajjāsi, tvañca tāta sukhī bhava jā. 2.22.2148, ammaṃ ārogyaṃ vajjātha, ayaṃ no neti brāhmaṇo jā. 2.22.2174 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:962: Hiyyattaniyaṃ-so avadā, vadā, avajjā, vajjā, te avadū, vadū, avajjū, vajjū.
anya-e0201n5:963: Ajjattaniyaṃ-so avadi, vadi, avajji, vajji, te avaduṃ, vaduṃ, avajjuṃ, vajjuṃ, avadiṃsu, vadiṃsu, avajjiṃsu, vajjiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:968: Kārite-nivedeti, paṭivedeti, nivedayati, paṭivedayati, paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave ma. ni. 1.416, jānāpemīti attho. Vedayāmahaṃ bhante, vedayatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretūti cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102 jānāpemi, pākaṭaṃ karomīti vā attho.
anya-e0201n5:969: ‘‘Vediyāmahaṃ bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū’’tipi cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102 pāṭho, tattha apaccaye pare iyādeso yujjati.
anya-e0201n5:971: Īādimhi-paccayānaṃ khayaṃ avedi, te viduṃ, vidiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:972: Kārite-nivedesi, nivedayi, paṭivedesi, paṭivedayi, nivedayuṃ, nivedayiṃsu, paṭivedayuṃ, paṭivedayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:973: Ssatyādimhi-vidissati, vedissati, parisuddhāti vedissāmi mahāva. 134 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:975: Kamme-adhi, āpubbo, tena gāmo adhivasīyati, āvasīyati, ajjhāvasīyati.
anya-e0201n5:976: ‘Assū’ti suttena akārassa uttaṃ, vussati, vussanti, vussare, ‘‘bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’’ti ma. ni. 1.257 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:979: Īādimhi-avasi, vasi, avasuṃ, vasuṃ, avasiṃsu, vasiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:980: Ssatyādīsu-‘labha vasa chida gama bhida rudānaṃ cchaṅa’iti ssena saha dhātvantassa cchādeso, vacchati, vasissati, vacchanti, vasissanti, āyasmato nissāya vacchāmi mahāva. 77, na te vacchāmi santike jā. 2.22.1933, avacchā, avasissā, avacchaṃsu, avasissaṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:983: Yassa pubbarūpatte-pavissati, pavissanti, pavissare, pavissate, pavissante, pavissare.
anya-e0201n5:987: Mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa kkho hoti, pāvekkhi pathaviṃ cecco jā. 1.19.98, so pāvekkhi kāsirājā jā. 1.15.266, so tassa gehaṃ pāvekkhi jā. 1.15.303, pāvisuṃ, pāvisiṃsu, pāvekkhiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:988: Ssatyādīsu ‘vaca bhuja muca visānaṃ kkhaṅa’iti ssena saha dhātvantassa kkho, pavekkhati, pavisissati, pavekkhanti, pavisissanti, esa bhiyyo pavekkhāmi, vammikaṃ sataporisaṃ jā. 1.4.100, pāvekkhā, pavisissā, pāvekkhaṃsu, pavisissaṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:989: Sada-saṃsīdane, ‘jarasadānamīma vā’tiādisaramhā īmaāgamo hoti vā, sīdati, sīdanti, lābūni sīdanti, silā plavanti jā. 1.1.77, saṃsīdati, visīdati, osīdati, avasīdati.
anya-e0201n5:992: Kāritepi na vuddhi ādesantarattā, sīdeti, sīdayati, saṃsīdeti, saṃsīdayati, osīdeti, osīdayati, osīdāpeti, osīdāpayati, nisīdāpeti, nisīdāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:993: Papubbamhi īma na hoti, pitā puttaṃ buddhe pasādeti, pasādayati, pasādenti, pasādayanti.
anya-e0201n5:996: ‘Kvaci vikaraṇāna’nti suttena lavikaraṇassa lope hanti, phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti cūḷava. 335, hanti kuddho puthujjano a. ni. 7.64.
anya-e0201n5:997: Mahāvuttinā kvaci dhātvantalopo, vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ varaṃ jā. 2.22.2370, luddakā migaṃ hanti, kevaṭṭā macchaṃ hanti.
anya-e0201n5:999: Dhātvantassa cavaggatte yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, haññati, haññanti.
anya-e0201n5:1009: Hanamhā parassa ssakārassa je, khādesā honti vā, mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1010: Hajjeti , hanissati, hajjenti, hajjesi, hajjetha, hajjemi, hanissāmi, hajjema, hanissāma.
anya-e0201n5:1011: Khādese mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa vaggantattaṃ, paṭihaṅkhati, paṭihanissati, paṭihaṅkhanti, paṭihaṅkhasi, paṭihaṅkhāmi, paṭihaṅkhāma, paṭihanissāma.
anya-e0201n5:1019: Āādīsu īādīsu ca harassa rakārassa ā hoti vā, so ahā, aharā.
anya-e0201n5:1020: Īādimhi-so ahāsi, ajini maṃ ahāsi me dha. pa. 3-4, attānaṃ upasaṃhāsi, āsanaṃ abhihāsi, sāsane vihāsi, vihāsi purisuttamo gavesitabbaṃ, dhammaṃ payirudāhāsi, ahari, hari, vihāsuṃ, āhiṃsu, vihiṃsu vā, ‘‘mā me tato mūlaphalaṃ āhaṃsū’’ti jā. 2.18.22 pāḷi, ahāsuṃ, aharuṃ, haruṃ, ahariṃsu, hariṃsu, tvaṃ ahāsi, ahari, tumhe ahāsittha, aharittha, ahaṃ ahāsiṃ, ahariṃ, vihāsiṃ sāsane rato apa. thera 1.2.84, mayaṃ ahāsimhā, aharimhā.
anya-e0201n5:1021: Parachakke assa tthattaṃ, so ahāsittha, aharittha.
anya-e0201n5:1024: Ssakāravatīsu vibhattīsu ssena saha harassa ca karassa ca rakārassa āhaṅa hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1025: Iu āgame-hāhiti, khārikājañca hāhiti jā. 2.22.1759. Hāhati vā, harissati, hāhinti, hāhanti, harissanti, hāhasi, sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi dha. pa. 379. Hāhatha, hāhāmi, hāhāma, harissāma.
anya-e0201n5:1026: Mahāvuttinā harassa dhātvantassa lopo ca, ‘‘yo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye appamatto vihassati saṃ. ni. 1.185, purakkhatvā vihassāma therīgā. 121, ahaṃ udakamāhissa’’nti jā. 2.22.1931 pāḷī.
anya-e0201n5:1028: Āpubba sīsa-patthanāyaṃ, āsīsati, āsīsanti, paccāsīsati, paccāsīsanti.
anya-e0201n5:1030: Ādibhūtā saramhā paraṃ paṭhamasaddarūpaṃ ekassaraṃ dverūpaṃ hoti, iminā sarapubbānaṃ dhātupadānaṃ padadvitte āsīsa, sīsa iti rūpadvayaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0201n5:1032: Dvitte anādibhūtassa ekassa byañjanassa lopo hotīti purime sīsarūpe sakāralopo.
anya-e0201n5:1034: Tathā ‘parokkhāyañcā’ti sutte casaddena kamādīnaṃ dhātupadānaṃ padadvitte kate ‘loponādibyañjanassā’ti purime padarūpe anādibyañjanalopo, ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti sesassa kavaggassa cavaggattaṃ, ‘niggahītañcā’ti niggahītāgamo, caṅkamati, caṅkamanti, caṅkamatu, caṅkamantu, caṅkameyya, caṅkameyyuṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1037: Mahāvuttinā niggahītassa pararūpatte jara-bhijjane, jajjarati jajjaranti.
anya-e0201n5:1039: Muha-vecitte, momuhati, momuhanti, mahāvuttinā ussa ottaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1042: Padadvittaṃ nāma padatthānaṃ atisayatādīpanatthaṃ, vicchāyaṃ pana ponopuñña, sambhamādīsu ca dvitte anādibyañjanalopo natthi, gāmo gāmo ramaṇīyo. Tathā kvaci atisayadīpanepi, rūparūpaṃ, dukkhadukkhaṃ, ajjhattajjhattaṃ, devadevo, munimuni, rājarājā, brahmabrahmā, varavaro, aggaaggo, jeṭṭhajeṭṭho, seṭṭhaseṭṭho, pasatthapasattho, uggatauggato, ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho, omakomako, dubbaladubbalo, abalaabalo, mahantamahanto iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1046: ‘Kattarī’ti padaṃ vattate, tañca bahulādhikārā vikaraṇānaṃ kattari nibandhaṃ bhāva, kammesu anibandhaṃ vikappena pavattiṃ dīpeti, tasmā bhāva, kammesu ca kāritarūpesu ca vikaraṇānaṃ pavatti veditabbā hotīti.
anya-e0201n5:1047: Chida, bhida, bhuja, muca, yuja, rica, rudha, lipa, vida, sica, subha.
anya-e0201n5:1049: Rudhādīhi kriyatthehi kattari lo hoti, tesañca rudhādīnaṃ pubbantasaramhā paraṃ niggahītaṃ āgacchati, mānubandho pubbantadīpanattho, akāro uccāraṇattho, casaddena rudha, subhādīhi i, ī, e, opaccaye saṅgaṇhāti, niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1052: Kamme kyo, ‘tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti yamhi dhātvantassa cavaggattaṃ, ‘vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pubbarūpattaṃ. Chijjati, chijjanti.
anya-e0201n5:1053: ‘Garupubbā rassā re ntentīna’nti catunnaṃ nte, ntīnaṃ rettaṃ, chindate, chijjate, chijjante, chijjare.
anya-e0201n5:1054: Iminā niggahītāgamo, chindīyati, chindīyanti, chindīyate, chindīyante.
anya-e0201n5:1055: Kārite-chedeti, chedayati, chedāpeti, chedāpayati, chindeti, chindayati, chindāpeti, chindāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:1056: Īādimhi-acchindi , chindi, acchinduṃ, chinduṃ, acchindiṃsu, chindiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:1057: Mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa ccho pubbassa dvittañca, acchecchi taṇhaṃ, vivattayi saṃyojanaṃ itivu. 53, ‘‘acchejjī’’tipi divādipāṭho dissati, acchecchuṃ vata bho rukkhaṃ jā. 2.22.1788.
anya-e0201n5:1059: Kārite-chedesi, kaṇṇanāsañca chedayi jā. 1.4.49, chindesi, chindayi.
anya-e0201n5:1060: Ssatyādimhi-‘labhavasachidagamabhidarudānaṃ cchaṅa’iti ssena saha dhātvantassa ccho, checchati, chindissati, checchanti, chindissanti, checchasi, checchata, checchāmi, checchāma, chindissāma.
anya-e0201n5:1064: Kārite-bhikkhū bhikkhūhi bhedeti mahāva. 107, bhedayati, bhedāpeti, bhedāpayati, bhindeti, bhindayati, bhindāpeti, bhindāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:1066: Īādimhi-abhindi, bhindi, abhinduṃ, bhinduṃ, abhindiṃsu, bhindiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:1068: Kārite-abhedesi, bhedesi, abhedayi, bhedayi, bhedāpesi, bhedāpayi.
anya-e0201n5:1069: Ssatyādimhi-‘labhavasa…’iccādinā ssena saha dassa ccho, bhecchati, bhindissati, bhecchanti, bhindissanti, bhecchasi, bhecchatha, bhecchāmi, bhecchāma, bhindissāma, ‘‘taṃ te paññāya bhecchāmī’’ti su. ni. 445 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:1075: Ssatyādimhi-‘vacabhujamucavisānaṃ kkhaṅa’iti ssena saha dhātvantassa kkho, ādivuddhi, bhokkhati, bhuñjissati, bhokkhanti, bhokkhasi, bhokkhatha, bhokkhāmi, bhokkhāma, bhuñjissāma.
anya-e0201n5:1081: Kārite-amocesi, mocesi, amocayi, mocayi, amocesuṃ, mocesuṃ, amocayuṃ, mocayuṃ, amociṃsu, mociṃsu, amocayiṃsu, mocayiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:1082: Ssatyādimhi-ssena saha cassa kkho, mokkhati, muñcissati, mokkhanti mārabandhanā dha. pa. 37. Na me samaṇa mokkhasi saṃ. ni. 1.140. Mokkhatha, mokkhāmi, mokkhāma, muñcissāma.
anya-e0201n5:1083: Ssādimhi-amokkhā , mokkhā, amuñcissā, muñcissā, amokkhaṃsu, mokkhaṃsu, amuñcissaṃsu, muñcissaṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:1084: Yuja-yoge, yuñjati buddhasāsane, ārabhatīti attho, yuñjanti, pamādamanuyuñjanti, bālā dummedhino janā dha. pa. 26. Yuñjasi, yuñjatha buddhasāsane saṃ. ni. 1.185. Yuñjāmi, yuñjāma.
anya-e0201n5:1086: Kārite-yojeti, payojeti, niyojeti, uyyojeti, yojayati, payojayati, niyojayati, uyyojayati.
anya-e0201n5:1088: Rudha-āvaraṇe, rundhati, rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, rundhoti, rundhanti, orundhati, avarundhati, rundhāpeti, rundhāpayati, avarodheti, avarodhayati, uparodheti, uparodhayati, rodhāpeti, rodhāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:1092: Kārite-limpeti, limpayati, limpāpeti, limpāpayati, lepeti, lepayati, lepāpeti, lepāpayati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1096: Īādimhi-avindi , vindi, udaṅgaṇe tattha papaṃ avinduṃ jā. 1.1.2, avindiṃsu, vindiṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1099: Kārite-siñceti, siñcayati, siñcāpeti, siñcāpayati, siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā pāci. 140 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1100: Subha-sampahāre, yo no gāvova sumbhati jā. 2.22.2132. Sumbhanti, sumbhasi, sumbhatha, bhūmiṃ sumbhāmi vegasā jā. 1.5.51, sumbhāma, sumbhiti, sumbhīti, sumbheti, sumbhoti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1101: Gahadhātupi idha saṅgahitā. Gaha-upādāne. ‘Mañca rudhādīna’nti niggahītena saha lapaccayo.
anya-e0201n5:1103: Gahadhātumhi āgatassa niggahītassa ṇo hoti. Mahāvuttinā vikappena lassa dīgho.
anya-e0201n5:1104: Gaṇhāti, gaṇhati vā, gaṇhanti, gaṇhasi, gaṇhatha, gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma.
anya-e0201n5:1106: ‘Hassa vipallāso’ti ha, yānaṃ vipariyāyo, gayhati, gayhanti, gayhare.
anya-e0201n5:1109: Nta, māna, tyādīsu gahassa gheppādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1113: Mahāvuttinā niggahītalopo, iuāgamassa ettaṃ, aggahesi, paṭiggahesi, anuggahesi, aggaṇhiṃsu, gaṇhiṃsu. Aggahesuṃ, paṭiggahesuṃ, anuggahesuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1118: Idha dhātūnaṃ kamo antakkharavasena vattabbo sabbaso sadisarūpattā.
anya-e0201n5:1119: Muca, vica, yuja, luja, vija, gada, pada, mada, vida, idha, kudha, gidha, budha, yudha, vidha, sidha, sudha mana, hana, kupa, dīpa, lupa, vapa, supa, divu, sivu, tasa, tusa, disa, dusa, sisa, susa, daha, naha, muha.
anya-e0201n5:1121: Divādīhi kriyatthehi kattari kānubandho yapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1123: Muca-muttiyaṃ, yassa pubbarūpattaṃ, muccati, vimuccati. Akammakattā suddhakammarūpaṃ na labbhati.
anya-e0201n5:1135: Pada-gatimhi, uppajjati, uppajjanti, nipajjati, vipajjati, sampajjati, āpajjati, samāpajjati, paṭipajjati.
anya-e0201n5:1136: Kamme-tena āpatti āpajjati, jhānaṃ samāpajjati, maggo paṭipajjati.
anya-e0201n5:1137: Kyamhi parepi yaka hoti, tena āpatti āpajjīyati. Jhānaṃ samāpajjīyati, maggo paṭipajjīyati.
anya-e0201n5:1138: Kārite-uppādeti, uppādayati, nipphādeti, nipphādayati. Sampādeti, sampādayati, āpādeti, āpādayati, paṭipādeti, paṭipādayati, paṭipajjāpeti, paṭipajjāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:1140: Uppajjatu , uppajjantu, uppajjeyya, uppajjeyyuṃ, kinti nu kho saddhivihārikassa patto uppajjiyetha, cīvaraṃ uppajjiyetha, parikkhāro uppajjiyethāti mahāva. 67 imāni pana kattu, kammarūpāni.
anya-e0201n5:1141: Īādimhi-uppajji, nipajji, vipajji, sampajji, āpajji, samāpajji, paṭipajji.
anya-e0201n5:1144: Cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi saṃ. ni. 5.1081 iccādi, uppajjiṃsu, nipajjiṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:1151: Kamme-tena dhammo bujjhati, dhammā bujjhanti, bujjhare, bujjhīyati, bujjhīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1152: Kārite-bodheti, bodhayati, bodhāpeti, bodhāpayati, bujjhāpeti, bujjhāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:1153: Yudha-sampahāre, mallo mallena saddhiṃ yujjhati, dve senā yujjhanti, dve meṇḍā yujjhanti, dve usabhā yujjhanti, dve hatthino yujjhanti, dve kukkuṭā yujjhanti.
anya-e0201n5:1155: Kārite-yodheti , yodhayati, yujjhāpeti, yujjhāpayati, ‘‘yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhenā’’ti dha. pa. 40 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:1156: Vidha-tāḷane, sarena migaṃ vijjhati, dhammaṃ paṭivijjhati, paṭivijjhanti.
anya-e0201n5:1157: Kamme kattusadisampi rūpaṃ hoti, tena dhammo paṭivijjhati, dhammā paṭivijjhanti, paṭivijjhīyati, paṭivijjhīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1160: Kārite mahāvuttinā issa āttaṃ, sādheti, sādhayati, sādhenti, sādhayanti.
anya-e0201n5:1164: Mana-maññanāyaṃ, maññati, avamaññati, atimaññati, maññanti, avamaññanti, atimaññanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1165: Hana-vighāta, saṅghātesu, haññati, vihaññati, haññanti, vihaññanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1166: Kupa-kope, paro parassa kuppati, kucchivāto kuppati, rogo kuppati, paṭikuppati, tejodhātu pakuppati ma. ni. 1.305.
anya-e0201n5:1168: Dīpa-dittiyaṃ, dippati, dippanti, pure adhammo dippati cūḷava. 437.
anya-e0201n5:1170: Kārite garupantattā na vuddhi, dīpeti, dīpayati, dīpenti, dīpayanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1176: Samu-upasame nivāse ca, sammati, visammati, upasammati, vūpasammati, assame sammati, yattha sammati temiyo jā. 2.22.73, sammanti. Kārite na vuddhi, sameti, vūpasameti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1177: Divu-kīḷāyaṃ vijigīsāyaṃ byavahāre thuti, kanti, gati, sattīsu ca, ‘tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti yamhi vassa battaṃ, ‘vaggalasehi te’ti yassa battaṃ, dibbati, dibbanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1178: Sivu-saṃsibbane, sibbati, sibbanti, sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyya vā pāci. 176 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1180: Mahāvuttinā tassa trattaṃ, utrassati, ubbijjatīti attho. Tassati, paritassati, pipāsatīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:1185: Disa-paññāyane, dissati, padissati, sandissati. Dissanti bālā abyattā mahāva. 76, nimittāni padissanti bu. vaṃ. 2.82, ime dhammā mayi sandissanti, ahañca imesu dhammesu sandissāmi ma. ni. 3.253 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ).
anya-e0201n5:1186: Dusa-paṭighāte , dussati. Dosaneyyesu dussati. Padussati, dussanti, padussanti.
anya-e0201n5:1191: Susa-sussane, sussati. Aṭṭhi ca nhāru ca cammañca avasissatu, upasussatu me sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ ma. ni. 2.184 (thokaṃ visadisaṃ) iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1192: Daha-dāhe, ha, yānaṃ vipariyāyo, dayhati, dayhanti, ekacitakamhi dayhare.
anya-e0201n5:1195: Muha-muyhane, muyhati, sammuyhati, sammuyhāmi, pamuyhāmi. Sabbā muyhanti me disā jā. 2.22.2185.
anya-e0201n5:1200: Gi, ci, mi, vu, su, hi, āpa, saka.
anya-e0201n5:1203: Svādīhi kriyatthehi paraṃ kānubandhā ṇā, ṇo iti dve paccayā honti.
anya-e0201n5:1205: Ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṃ akārassa ca te e, o, ā na honti kānubandhanāgamesu paresūti vuddhipaṭisedho.
anya-e0201n5:1209: Ci-caye, mahāvuttinā ṇassa nattaṃ, vaḍḍhakī pākāraṃ cināti, cinoti, ācināti, ācinoti, apacināti, apacinoti, viddhaṃsetīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:1211: Kamme-cīyati, ācīyati, apacīyati, cinīyati, ācinīyati, apacinīyati.
anya-e0201n5:1213: Mi-pakkhepe, miṇāti, miṇoti, mināti, minoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1215: Su-savane, suṇāti, suṇoti, suṇanti, suṇāsi, suṇosi.
anya-e0201n5:1216: Rassatte-suṇasi nāga mahāva. 126. Suṇātha, suṇotha, suṇāmi, suṇomi, suṇāma, suṇoma.
anya-e0201n5:1217: Kamme ‘dīgho sarassā’ti kyamhi dīgho, sūyati, suyyati, sūyanti, suyyanti, suṇīyati, suṇīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1218: Kārite-sāveti, anusāveti, sāvayati, anusāvayati, suṇāpeti, suṇāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:1220: Suṇātu, suṇantu, suyyatu, suyyantu, sāvetu, sāventu, suṇe, suṇeyya, suṇeyyuṃ, sūyeyya, suyyeyya, sūyeyyuṃ, suyyeyuṃ, sāveyya, sāveyyuṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1223: Tesu īādīsu ssakāravantesu ca vacanesu sudhātuto paresaṃ kṇo, kṇānaṃ roṭa hoti, rānubandho sabbādesadīpanattho. ‘Rānubandhentasarādissā’ti suttena ādisarassa lopo, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1224: Assosi, assosuṃ, assosi, assosittha, assosiṃ, assosimhā, assosumhā, assosittha iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1225: Ssatyādimhi-suṇissati, sossati, suṇissanti, sossanti, suṇissasi, sossasi, suṇissatha, sossatha, suṇissāmi, sossāmi, suṇissāma, sossāma. Evaṃ parachakke.
anya-e0201n5:1228: Īādimhi-dūtaṃ pahiṇi, pahiṇiṃsu, ‘kvaci vikaraṇāna’nti vikaraṇalopo, mahāvuttinā passa dīgho, dūtaṃ pāhesi pārā. 297; mahāva. 198, pāhesuṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1231: Saka, āpadhātūnaṃ kānubandhā kukāra, ukārā kamena āgamā honti kṇamhi paccaye.
anya-e0201n5:1244: Sakamhā parassa kṇāssa kho hoti īādimhi.
anya-e0201n5:1247: Sakamhā parassa kṇassa kho hoti vā sse pare.
anya-e0201n5:1248: Sakkhissati, sakkuṇissati, sakkhissanti, sakkuṇissanti, sakkhissasi, sakkhissatha, sakkhissāmi, sakkhissāma, sakkuṇissāma.
anya-e0201n5:1249: ‘Dakkha sakkha hehi hohīhi lopo’ti ssassa vikappena lopo, sakkhiti, sakkhissati, sakkhinti, sakkhissanti.
anya-e0201n5:1254: Kī, ji, ñā, dhū, pu, bhū, mā, mū, lū.
anya-e0201n5:1256: Kīiccādīhi kriyatthehi paraṃ kattari kānubandho ṇāpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1266: Kārite-jayāpeti, jayāpayati, parājeti, parājayati, parājenti, parājayanti, jināpeti, jināpayati, ajini, jini, ajiniṃsu, jiniṃsu, jinissati, jinissanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1270: Jānāti, pajānāti, ājānāti, sañjānāti, vijānāti, abhijānāti, parijānāti, paṭijānāti, jānanti.
anya-e0201n5:1271: Kamme-ñāyati, paññāyati, aññāyati, saññāyati, viññāyati, abhiññāyati, pariññāyati, paṭiññāyati, ñāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1272: Kārite-ñāpeti , ñāpayati, ñāpenti, ñāpayanti, jānāpeti, jānāpayati, jānāpenti, jānāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:1275: Nāsahitassa ñāssa nāyo hoti timhi, suttavibhattiyā anti, antesu ca.
anya-e0201n5:1276: Nāyati. Viceyya viceyya atthe panāyatīti kho bhikkhave vipassīti vuccati dī. ni. 2.41-44. Nāyanti. ‘‘Animittā na nāyare’’ti visuddhi 1.174 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:1277: Eyyādimhi-jāneyya, jāneyyuṃ, jāneyyāsi, jāneyyātha, jāneyyāmi, jāneyyāma.
anya-e0201n5:1279: Eyyāmassa emutte ‘‘kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya’’nti jā. 2.22.7 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:1281: Ñāto eyyassa iyā, ñā honti, vāsaddena eyyumādīnampi ñū, ñāsi, ñātha, ñāmi, ñāmādesā honti, eyyamiccassa ñañca.
anya-e0201n5:1284: Ñādese pare sanāssa ñāssa jaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1286: Suttavibhattena ñūādīsupi jaṃ hoti. ‘‘Pāpaṃ katvā mā maṃ jaññūti icchati su. ni. 127; vibha. 894 ‘jaññā’ti, vivekadhammaṃ ahaṃ vijaññaṃ gavesitabbaṃ, jaññāmu ce sīlavantaṃ vadaññu’’nti jā. 2.22.1301 pāḷī. ‘Jaññāsi, jaññātha, jaññāmi, jaññāmā’tipi yujjati.
anya-e0201n5:1288: Knāssa lopo hoti vā īādimhi ssatyādimhi ca.
anya-e0201n5:1289: Aññāsi, abbhaññāsi, ajāni, aññāsuṃ, aññaṃsu, abbhaññaṃsu, jāniṃsu, aññāsi, abbhaññāsi, ajāni, aññittha, jānittha, aññāsiṃ, abbhaññāsiṃ, ajāniṃ, jāniṃ, aññāsimhā, ajānimhā, jānimhā, ñāssati, jānissati, ñāssanti, jānissanti.
anya-e0201n5:1292: Ñāto ssassa hi hoti vā kamme.
anya-e0201n5:1293: Paññāyihi. ‘‘Paññāyihinti etā, daharā’’ti jā. 2.17.197 pāḷi. Paññāyissati, paññāyissanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1298: Bhū-pattiyaṃ, rasso, abhisambhunāti, abhisambhunanti. Nāssa ṇatte-abhisambhuṇāti, abhisambhuṇanti.
anya-e0201n5:1299: Mā-parimāṇe , mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa ittaṃ, mināti, nimmināti.
anya-e0201n5:1301: Kārite-nagaraṃ māpeti, māpayati, māpīyati, māpīyanti, nimmini, nimminiṃsu, māpesi, māpayi, māpesuṃ, māpayuṃ, nimminissati, nimminissanti, māpessati, māpessanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1314: Āpa-pāpuṇane papubbo. Dhātvantassa dvittaṃ rasso ca, pappoti, papponti.
anya-e0201n5:1320: ‘Tavaggavaraṇānaṃ ye cavaggabayañā’ti yamhi dhātvantassa yattaṃ, kayyati, kayyanti, kayyare, kayyate, kayyante.
anya-e0201n5:1321: Kārite-kāreti, kārayati, kārenti, kārayanti, kārāpeti, kārāpayati, kārāpenti, kārāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:1323: O-kārasahitassa karassa kuṃ hoti mi, mesu paresu.
anya-e0201n5:1324: Kummi, kumma, ‘‘bhattu apacitiṃ kummi jā. 1.3.126, dhammassāpacitiṃ kummī’’ti jā. 2.22.1752 pāḷī.
anya-e0201n5:1326: Pādito parassa karadhātussa kvaci kho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1332: 683.Karassa sossa kubbakurukayirāka. 511-2; rū. 521-2; nī. 1077-8-9-10; caṃ. 5.2.103; pā. 6.4.110.
anya-e0201n5:1333: O-kārasahitassa karassa kubba, kuru, kayirā honti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu, mahāvuttinā vikappena kussa kruttaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1335: Parachakke-kubbate, krubbate, kubbante, krubbante, kurute, kayirati, kayiranti, kayirasi, kayiratha, kayirāmi, kayirāma, kayirate, kayirante.
anya-e0201n5:1336: Karotu, saṅkharotu, kubbatu, krubbatu, kurutu, agghaṃ kurutu no bhavaṃ dī. ni. 2.318, kayiratu.
anya-e0201n5:1339: Kayirādesato parassa eyyavibhattissa ṭānubandho ā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1340: So puññaṃ kayirā, puññaṃ ce puriso kayirā dha. pa. 118, kayirā naṃ punappunaṃ dha. pa. 118.
anya-e0201n5:1342: Kayirādesato parassa eyyuṃādīnaṃ eyyasaddassa lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1343: Kayiruṃ, kayireyyuṃ, kayirāsi, kayireyyāsi, kayirātha, kayireyyātha, kayirāmi, kayireyyāmi, kayirāma, kayireyyāma.
anya-e0201n5:1345: Kayirādesato parassa ethassa e-kārassa ā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1346: So kayirātha, dīpaṃ kayirātha paṇḍito dha. pa. 28, kayirā ce kayirāthenaṃ dha. pa. 313; saṃ. ni. 1.89.
anya-e0201n5:1347: Īādimhi-akari, kari, saṅkhari, abhisaṅkhari, akubbi, kubbi, akrubbi, krubbi, akayiri, kayiri, akaruṃ, karuṃ, saṅkharuṃ, abhi, saṅkharuṃ, akariṃsu, kariṃsu, saṅkhariṃsu, abhisaṅkhariṃsu, akubbiṃsu, kubbiṃsu, akrubbiṃsu, krubbiṃsu, akayiriṃsu, kayiriṃsu, akayiruṃ, kayiruṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1349: Īādīsu saokārassa karassa kā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1351: Ā, e, ūdīghehi parassa īvacanassa si hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1352: Aṭṭhāsi, adāsi, vadesi, vajjesi, bhāvesi, kāresianubhosi, ahosi iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1353: So akāsi, te akaṃsu, gāthāyaṃ ‘‘akaṃsu satthuvacana’’nti jā. 2.22.564 pāḷi. Akāsuṃ, tvaṃ akāsi. Mā tumhe evarūpaṃ akattha gavesitabbaṃ, mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvī vā yadi vā raho udā. 44. Akāsittha, ahaṃ akāsiṃ, mayaṃ akāsimhā, akamhā. Bhogesu vijjamānesu, dīpaṃ nākamha attano jā. 1.4.53. So akā. ‘‘Tato ekasataṃ khatye, anuyante bhavaṃ akā’’ti jā. 2.20.94 pāḷi. Akāsittha vā, ahaṃ akaṃ, akaraṃ vā. ‘‘Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ nākaṃ, pitu vuddhassa bhāsita’’nti jā. 2.17.134 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:1354: Kārite-so kāresi, kārayi, kārāpesi, kārāpayi, te kāresuṃ, kārayuṃ, kārāpesuṃ, kārāpayuṃ iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1355: Karissati saṅkharissati, kubbissati, krubbissati, kayirissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1356: ‘‘Harassa cāhaṅa sse’ti ssena saha karassa rakārassa āhaṅa hoti, kāhati, kāhanti, kathaṃ kāhanti dārakā jā. 2.22.1849.
anya-e0201n5:1357: Iñāgame-kāhiti, kāhinti iccādi. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ jā. 1.4.56, kāhāma puññasañcayaṃ apa. thera 1.1.401.
anya-e0201n5:1358: ‘Āīādīsū’ti sutte yogavibhāgena ssatyādīsupi kā hoti, saṃyoge rassattaṃ, kassati, kassanti, kassasi, kassatha, kassāmi, kassāma, kassaṃ purisakāriyaṃ jā. 2.22.131.
anya-e0201n5:1367: Pubbachakke ovikaraṇassa kvaci u hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1373: Tanadhātussa na-kārassa ā hoti vā kyamhi.
anya-e0201n5:1374: Tāyati, tāyanti, patāyati, patāyanti. ‘‘Ito’dāni patāyanti, sūciyo balisāni cā’’ti jā. 1.6.84 pāḷi. Tāyate, tāyante.
anya-e0201n5:1375: Saka-sattiyaṃ, sakkoti, sakkonti, sakkosi, sakkotha, sakkomi, sakkoma.
anya-e0201n5:1379: Āpa, kamu, gaṇa, ghaṭa, cinta, ceta, cura, dhara, pāla, pūja, manta, māna, vida.
anya-e0201n5:1381: Curādīhi kriyatthehi paraṃ sakatthe ṇipaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1384: Kamu-icchāyaṃ, kāmeti, kāmayati, kāmenti, kāmayanti, nikāmeti, nikāmayati, nikāmenti, nikāmayanti.
anya-e0201n5:1388: Gaṇa-saṅkhyāne, gaṇa, ghaṭānaṃ tudādittā na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati.
anya-e0201n5:1390: Cinta-cintāyaṃ, garupantattā na vuddhi, cinteti, cintayati.
anya-e0201n5:1394: Īādimhi-cintesi, cintayi, cinteyuṃ, cintayuṃ, cintesi, cintayi, cintayittha, cintesiṃ, cintayiṃ, cintesimhā, cintayimhā.
anya-e0201n5:1399: Pūja-pūjāyaṃ, garupantattā na vuddhi, pūjeti, pūjayati, pūjenti, pūjayanti.
anya-e0201n5:1401: Āpubbo kathane āmantane ca. Āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave dī. ni. 2.218, bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi dī. ni. 2.208.
anya-e0201n5:1403: Īādimhi-mantesi , mantayi, āmantesi, āmantayi, nimantesi, nimantayi, mantesuṃ, mantayuṃ, mantayiṃsu rahogatā jā. 2.22.1918, mantessati, āmantessati, nimantessati, mantayissati, āmantayissati, nimantayissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1404: Māna-pūjāyaṃ, māneti, mānayati, mānenti, mānayanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1406: Paṭi, ni, papubbo ācikkhane, paṭivedeti, paṭivedayati, nivedeti, nivedayati, pavedeti, pavedayati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1411: Kriyāvācībhāvena dhāturūpā paccayā dhātupaccayā, kriyatthapaccayāti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā tehipi sabbesaṃ tyādi, tabbādivibhatti, paccayānaṃ sambhavo.
anya-e0201n5:1413: 693.Tijamānehi khasā khamāvīmaṃsāsuka. 433; rū. 528; nī. 906-9; caṃ. 1.1.17, 28; pā. 3.1.5.
anya-e0201n5:1414: Khamāyaṃ vīmaṃsāyañca pavattehi tija, mānadhātūhi paraṃ kamena kha, sapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n5:1417: Kha , cha, sapaccayantānaṃ dhāturūpānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saddarūpaṃ ekassaraṃ dverūpaṃ hotīti ‘tija, tija’iti dvirūpe kate ‘loponādibyañjanassā’ti anādibyañjanabhūtassa ja-kārassa lopo, ‘pararūpamayakāre byañjane’ti dhātvantajakārassa pararūpattaṃ. ‘Catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti saṃyogādissa khassa kattaṃ, ‘titikkha’iti dhātupaccayantarūpaṃ, tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n5:1425: Māna-vīmaṃsāyaṃ, tato sapaccayo. ‘Khachasānamekassaraṃ dve’ti ‘māna, māna’iti dvirūpe kate –
anya-e0201n5:1426: 695.Mānassa vī parassa ca maṃka. 463-7; rū. 532-3; nī. 944.
anya-e0201n5:1427: Dvitte pubbassa mānassa vī hoti, parassa ca sabbassa mānassa maṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1432: Vīmaṃsāyanti kiṃ? Māna-pūjāyaṃ, māneti, sammāneti, abhimāneti, pūjetīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:1434: 696.Kitā tikicchāsaṃsayesu choka. 433; rū. 528; nī. 906-9; caṃ. 1.1.18; pā. 3.1.5 kā.
anya-e0201n5:1435: Tikicchāyaṃ saṃsaye ca pavattakitadhātuto paraṃ cho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1438: Saṃsayamhā aññasmiṃ tikicchatthe pavattassa kitadhātussa dvitte pubbassa kitassati hoti vā. ‘Pararūpamayakāre byañjane’ti pararūpattaṃ, saṃyogādissa cakārattaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1439: Tikicchati, tikicchanti. Devāpi naṃ tikicchanti, mātāpettibharaṃ naraṃ jā. 2.22.408.
anya-e0201n5:1442: Vāsaddena tikārābhāve ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti dvitte pubbassa cavaggo, cikicchati, cikicchanti, cikicchīyati, cikicchīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1445: Kita-ñāṇe nivāse ca, ketati, saṃketati, niketati.
anya-e0201n5:1447: 698.Nindāyaṃ gupabadhā bassa bho caka. 433; rū. 528; caṃ. 1.1.19, 20; pā. 3.1.5, 6 kā.
anya-e0201n5:1448: Nindāyaṃ pavattehi gupa, badhehi paraṃ chapaccayo hoti, bassa ca bho hoti. Dvirūpe kate anādibyañjanalopo.
anya-e0201n5:1450: Gupissa dvitte pubbassa u-kārassa i hoti. Gassa cavaggattaṃ, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṃ, saṃyogādissa paṭhamattaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1453: Kārite-jiguccheti, jigucchayati, jigucchāpeti, jigucchāpayati. Jigucchatu, jigucchantu iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1457: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti kha, cha, sesūti assa ittaṃ, parabakārassa ca bhattaṃ, dhātvantassa pararūpādi.
anya-e0201n5:1459: Nindāyanti kiṃ? Badha-bandhana, hiṃsāsu, bādheti, bādhayati. Vātaṃ jālena bādhesi jā. 1.12.8.
anya-e0201n5:1463: 701.Tuṃsmā lopo cicchāyaṃ teka. 434; rū. 534; nī. 910; caṃ. 1.1.22; pā. 3.1.7.
anya-e0201n5:1464: Tumantehi icchatthe te kha, cha, sā honti, tuṃpaccayassa ca lopo hoti. Idañca suttaṃ tumicchatthasambhave sati sabbadhātupadehipi kha, cha, sānaṃ pavattidīpanatthaṃ. Tena tumicchatthe sa, chapaccaye katvā ‘ū byañjanassā’ti sa, chānaṃ ādimhi īāgamaṃ katvā ‘‘aputtaṃ puttamiva ācarituṃ icchati puttīyīsati, pabbato viya attānaṃ ācarituṃ icchati pabbatāyīsati, dātuṃ icchati dicchati’’ iccādīni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n5:1465: Bhuja, ghasa, hana, ji, hara, pā, su.
anya-e0201n5:1466: Bhuñjituṃ icchatīti atthe-bhujato khapaccayo, tuṃpaccayalopo, dvittaṃ, pubbassa anādilopo, pararūpatte saṃyogādissa paṭhamattaṃ, pubbassa bhassa battaṃ, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti, bubhukkhīyati, bubhukkhīyanti, bubhukkheti, bubhukkhayati, bubhukkhāpeti, bubhukkhāpayati, bubhukkhāpīyati, bubhukkhāpīyanti, bubhukkhatu, bubhukkhantu, bubhukkheyya, bubhukkheyyuṃ, bubhukkhi, bubhukkhiṃsu, bubhukkhissati, bubhukkhissanti, bubhukkhissā, bubhukkhissaṃsu.
anya-e0201n5:1467: Ghasa-adane, ghasituṃ icchatīti atthe – chapaccayo, dvittādi, pubbassa ghassa gattaṃ, gassa jattaṃ, assa ittaṃ, jighacchati, jighacchanti, jighacchīyati, jighacchīyanti, jighaccheti, jighacchāpeti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1468: Hana-hiṃ sāyaṃ, hantuṃ icchatīti atthe – chapaccayo, dvittādi, ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti pubbassa hassa jo, assa ittaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1470: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṃ hoti se pare.
anya-e0201n5:1472: Ji-jaye, jetuṃ icchatīti atthe – sapaccayo, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1474: Ji, harānaṃ dvitte parassa jissa harassa ca gī hoti se pare.
anya-e0201n5:1476: Hara-haraṇe, dvittādi, parassa gī, pubbassa hassa jo, assa ittaṃ, jigīsati, harituṃ icchatīti attho, jigīsanti.
anya-e0201n5:1477: Pā-pāne, pivituṃ icchatīti atthe – sapaccayo, dvittaṃ, ‘rasso pubbassā’ti rasso, assa ittaṃ, pipāsati, pipāsanti, pipāsīyati, pipāsīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1478: Su-savane, sotuṃ icchatīti atthe – dvitte parassa dvittaṃ, sussusati sussūsati (bahūsu), sussusanti, sussusīyati, sussusīyanti, sussuseti, sussusayati, sussusāpeti, sussusāpayati, sussusāpīyati, sussusāpīyanti, sussusatu, sussusantu iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1479: Titikkhituṃ icchatīti atthe – titikkhato sapaccayo, sapaccayaparattā puna dvittappasaṅge –
anya-e0201n5:1481: Sakiṃ dvitte kate puna dvittaṃ na āpajjatīti puna dvittābhāvo, ‘ū byañjanassā’ti ū āgamo.
anya-e0201n5:1482: Titikkhisati, titikkhisanti iccādi. Evaṃ tikicchituṃ icchatīti tikicchisati, tikicchisanti, cikicchisati, cikicchisanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1483: Iti tumicchatthe kha, cha, sa rāsi.
anya-e0201n5:1487: Kammatthā nāmapadamhā icchatthe īyo hotīti kammabhūtā puttasaddato icchāyaṃ īyo, ‘puttīya’iti dhātupaccayantarūpaṃ, tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n5:1488: Puttīyati, puttīyanti, puttīyeti, puttīyayati, puttīyāpeti, puttīyāpayati, puttīyāpīyati, puttīyāpīyanti. Evaṃ cīvarīyati, cīvarīyanti, pattīyati, pattīyanti, parikkhārīyati, parikkhārīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1491: Upamīyati upametabbo attho etenāti upamānaṃ, upamānabhūtā kammapadato ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1493: Kamme-aputtopi putto viya ācarīyati puttīyīyati, puttīyīyanti, puttīyeti, puttīyayati, puttīyāpeti, puttīyāpayati, puttīyāpīyati, puttīyāpīyanti. Evaṃ sissīyati, sissīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1496: Upamānabhūtā ādhārabhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1497: Kuṭīyati, kuṭīyanti pāsāde, nadiyaṃ viya samudde ācarati nadīyati, nadīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1498: Araññe viya nagare ācarati araññīyati, araññīyanti nagare. Evaṃ gehīyati vihāre.
anya-e0201n5:1499: Lokadhammehi akampanīyaṭṭhena pabbato viya attānaṃ ācaratīti atthe –
anya-e0201n5:1501: Upamānabhūtā kattubhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe āyo hotīti pabbatasaddato āyo. Tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n5:1502: Pabbatāyati saṅgho, pabbatāyanti, cicciṭo viya attānaṃ ācarati cicciṭāyati, saddo. Evaṃ paṭapaṭāyati, kaṭakaṭāyati, dhūmadhūmāyati, dhūpāyati, sandhūpāyati.
anya-e0201n5:1505: Cīpaccayassa attho abbhūtatabbhāvo jhattho nāma. Kattuto jhatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1506: Bhusāyati, bhusāyanti, apaṭopi paṭo bhavati paṭāyati, paṭāyanti, alohitampi lohitaṃ bhavati lohitāyati. Evaṃ nīlāyati, kamalāyati, candāyati, candanāyati, kañcanāyati, vajirāyati.
anya-e0201n5:1510: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi nāmehi karotyatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1511: Saddāyati, saddāyanti, veraṃ karoti verāyati, verāyanti, kalahaṃ karoti kalahāyati, kalahāyanti, mettaṃ karoti mettāyati, mettāyanti, karuṇaṃ karoti karuṇāyati, karuṇāyanti, muditaṃ karoti muditāyati, muditāyanti, upekkhaṃ karoti upekkhāyati, upekkhāyanti, kukkuccaṃ karoti kukkuccāyati, kukkuccāyanti, piyaṃ karoti piyāyati, piyāyanti, paccayaṃ saddahanaṃ karoti pattiyāyati, pattiyāyanti, taṇhaṃ karoti taṇhāyati, taṇhāyanti, taṇhīyati, taṇhīyanti vā, karotyatthe īyo. Mama idanti karoti mamāyati, mamāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1518: Dhātvattho vuccati yā kāci kriyā. Nāmasmā dhātvatthe i hoti. ‘Yuvaṇṇānameo paccaye’ti issa ettaṃ.
anya-e0201n5:1520: ‘Eonamayāvā sare’ti essa ayādeso. ‘Ṇiṇāpyāpīhi vā’ti ettha vāsaddena lapaccayo, samānayati, samānayanti, piṇaṃ karoti piṇeti, piṇayati, kusalaṃ pucchati kusaleti, kusalayati, visuddhaṃ hoti visuddheti, visuddhayati, vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇeti, upavīṇāyati, paññāya atikkamati atipaññeti, atipaññāyati, vaccaṃ karoti vacceti, vaccayati, muttaṃ karoti mutteti, muttayati, balena pīḷeti baleti, balayati.
anya-e0201n5:1525: Saccāpeti , saccāpenti, atthavibhāgaṃ karoti atthāpeti, atthāpenti, bedasatthaṃ karoti bedāpeti, bedāpenti, sukkhaṃ karoti sukkhāpeti, sukkhāpenti, sukhaṃ karoti sukhāpeti, sukhāpenti, dukkhaṃ karoti dukkhāpeti, dukkhāpenti, uṇhaṃ karoti uṇhāpeti, uṇhāpenti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1526: Aputtaṃ puttamiva ācarati puttīyati, puttīyituṃ icchatīti atthe ‘tuṃsmā lopo cicchāyaṃ te’ti sapaccayo.
anya-e0201n5:1528: Icchīyatīti iṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ yaṃ iṭṭhaṃ yathiṭṭhaṃ. ‘‘Yamiṭṭha’’ntipi pāṭho. Syādyantassa yathiṭṭhaṃ ekassaraṃ ādibhūta’maññaṃ vā dverūpaṃ hoti, na tyādissa viya ādibhūtamevāti attho. ‘Ū byañjanassā’ti ū āgamo.
anya-e0201n5:1531: Akamalaṃ kamalaṃ bhavati kamalāyati, kamalāyituṃ icchatīti kakamalāyisati, kamamalāyisati, kamalalāyisati iccādi.
